T03TD3803E:35a-37: bzhi pa ni yan lag bzhi ste /
T03TD3803E:35a-38: btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:35a-39: dran pa yongs su dag pa ni gnyen po'i yan lag go //
T03TD3803E:35a-40: sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
T03TD3803E:35a-41: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:35a-42: gzugs med pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste //
T03TD3803E:35b-0: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du @35b shes las yang dag par 'das nas thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skyed mched sdo //
T03TD3803E:35b-1: nam mkha'i 'du shes las yang dag par 'das nas rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skyed mched do //
T03TD3803E:35b-2: shes bya dang shes pa'i 'du shes dag las yang dag par 'das nas ci yang med do snyam pa ni ci yang med pa'i skyed mched do //
T03TD3803E:35b-3: ci yang med pa'i 'du shes las kyang yang dag par 'das phra ba ni 'du shes med pa dang 'dra ba yang dag par spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de srid pa'i rtse mo'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-4: de dag ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-5: sbyin sogs zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag nyid de dag ni pha rol phyin pa'i 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-6: lam dang zhes bya ba la lam ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos te //
T03TD3803E:35b-7: de dag bsgom pa ni lam gyi 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-8: byams pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la tshad med pa'i sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i phyir tshad med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-9: de la rnam pa bzhi ste //
T03TD3803E:35b-14: de dag gi go rims bzhin du bde ba dang ldan par 'dod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-15: sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-16: bde ba dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-17: kun nas nyon mongs pa med par 'dod pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-18: kye ma sems can thams cad ni bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig snyam pa dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-19: sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig snyam pa dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-20: bde ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig snyam pa dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-21: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur cig snyam pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-22: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te de dag ni tshad med pa'i 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-23: stong nyid nyi shus chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom pa ni mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:35b-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sbyin par bya ba dang //
T03TD3803E:35b-26: len pa po mi dmigs pa nas //
T03TD3803E:35b-27: shes rabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:36a-0: byang chub sems dpa' dang yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i bar de ni 'khor gsum yongs @36a * //
T03TD3803E:36a-4: sgom pa gang yang med pa de ni sgom pa mi dmigs pa ste sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa'o //
T03TD3803E:36a-5: de'i don dang de'i ched du gang dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa de ni ched du bya ba'i 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:36a-6: mngon par shes pa drug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /
T03TD3803E:36a-7: de dag la theg pa chen po'i chos nyan cing sems can rnams la yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T03TD3803E:36a-8: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba ni mngon par shes pa drug gi 'jug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:36a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob cing 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T03TD3803E:36a-10: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa ni rnam pa kun mkhyen pa'i 'jug pa ste /
T03TD3803E:36a-11: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa yang rdzogs so //
T03TD3803E:36a-12: tshogs kyi sgrub pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:36a-13: rtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug /
T03TD3803E:36a-14: zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang //
T03TD3803E:36a-15: zung du 'brel ba'i lam gang dang //
T03TD3803E:36a-16: thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3803E:36a-17: sems pa dang ni bsod nams dang //
T03TD3803E:36a-18: lam dang gzungs dang sa bcu dang //
T03TD3803E:36a-19: gnyen po'i tshogs kyi sgrub pa yi //
T03TD3803E:36a-20: rim pa yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3803E:36a-22: tshogs rnams kyi mthar ji ltar srid pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa la so sor rtog pa ni brtse ba la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:36a-23: de la dmyal ba dang yi dags dang /
T03TD3803E:36a-24: dud 'gror skyes pa dag la sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /
T03TD3803E:36a-25: sangs rgyas rnams la dad pa dang /
T03TD3803E:36a-26: lha dang mi rnams su skye bar 'dod pa ni skye ba'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:36a-27: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i tshogs drug gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag nyid do //
T03TD3803E:36a-28: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang zung du 'brel ba'i tshogs gsum pa ni go cha'i sgrub pa dang 'dra'o //
T03TD3803E:36a-29: gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dag la spyod pa gzhan dag la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa de ni thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:36a-30: gang stong pa nyid nyi shu dag yongs su shes pa de ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:36a-31: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag las rgya cher gsungs te //
T03TD3803E:36b-2: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-3: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-4: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-5: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-7: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-8: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-9: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-10: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-11: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-12: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-13: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-14: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-15: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-16: dngos po stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-17: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-18: rang gi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-19: gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:36b-20: 'di dag re re'i rigs pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-23: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:36b-24: gang gi phyir 'di dag ji ltar rigs par rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid kyis stong pa nyid de rtag pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:36b-25: rtag pa yang ther zug tu gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:36b-26: 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin te de dag gi rang bzhin ni rnam pa gnyis po de dag go //
T03TD3803E:36b-27: de bas na de ni de'i stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:36b-28: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni des de'i stong pa nyid de gang las skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T03TD3803E:36b-29: 'di'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gang las kyang mi skye ba zhes ston to //
T03TD3803E:36b-30: de la nang gi chos rnams ni mig la sogs pa drug ste /
T03TD3803E:36b-31: de dag gis ni nang stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:36b-32: phyi'i chos rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa drug ste /
T03TD3803E:36b-33: de de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do ;
T03TD3803E:36b-34: / mig la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag gi stong pa nyid de //
T03TD3803E:36b-35: de'i yul nyid kyi stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:36b-36: gzugs la sogs pa yang mig la sogs pas stong pa nyid de de'i yul can nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:36b-37: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid de de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:36b-38: chen po stong pa nyid ni phyogs rnams kyi stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:36b-39: don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste de des stong pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-0: 'dus byas ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams te de dag gis stong pa ni 'dus @37a * //
T03TD3803E:37a-2: gang skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang //
T03TD3803E:37a-4: mi 'gyur ba nyid de ni 'dus ma byas te de'i stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-5: gang gi mtha' mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste //
T03TD3803E:37a-6: de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-7: gang la thog ma dang tha ma med pa de la dbus kyi dngos po 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pas thog ma dang bar dang tha ma yang med de //
T03TD3803E:37a-8: dang po dang bar ma dang thams cad kyis stong pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-9: gang la spangs pa de ni dor ba ste //
T03TD3803E:37a-10: des stong pa ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de //
T03TD3803E:37a-11: gang la chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis nyan thos la sogs pas ma byas pas mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-12: des stong pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-13: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-14: gzugs so ring ba ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid do /
T03TD3803E:37a-15: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba'o //
T03TD3803E:37a-16: 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o zhes shes par bya ste //
T03TD3803E:37a-17: chos de dag thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-18: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni 'das pa dang ma 'ong pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams phan tshun mi dmigs pa yin te thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:37a-19: gang rten cing 'brel par byung pa de ni sngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te de ltar na yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni yod pa ma yin te //
T03TD3803E:37a-20: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid yin pas yang dag par sbyor bas stong pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-21: dngos po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ste des stong pa ni dngos po nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-22: dngos po med pa ni 'dus ma byas te de stong pa ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-23: rang gi ngo bo yin pas na rang gi ngo bo ste des stong pa ni rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-24: gzhan gyi ngo bo ni chos nyid de chos kyi dbyings so //
T03TD3803E:37a-25: des stong pa ni gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:37a-26: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang rin chen phyag rgya dang seng ge rnam par rol ba la sogs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:37b-0: lam gyi tshogs ni byang chub kyi phyogs rnam pa mang po yin pas de bshad par @37b bya'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-1: de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-2: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-3: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-6: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-7: 'phag pa'i lan yan lag brgyad de de ni byang chub kyi chis rnams so //
T03TD3803E:37b-8: de la gang gi rjes su lta bas dran pa nye bar gnas pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-9: dmigs pa'i bye brag gis ni bzhi ste //
T03TD3803E:37b-10: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-11: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-12: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-13: chos drang pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-14: de la nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang ;
T03TD3803E:37b-15: / lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par yang mi byed de de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas so //
T03TD3803E:37b-16: de bzhin du phyi'i lus dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-17: de bzhin du nang phyi'i lus dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-18: de bzhin du nang dang phyi dang phyi nang gi tshor ba dang sems dang ;
T03TD3803E:37b-19: / chos dang tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba nas //
T03TD3803E:37b-20: chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste //
T03TD3803E:37b-21: chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par yang mi byed la //
T03TD3803E:37b-22: de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtun pa shes bzhin can dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la phan pa'i sems dang //
T03TD3803E:37b-23: yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas so //
T03TD3803E:37b-24: 'dir nang gi lus ni rang gi mig la sogs pa drug go //
T03TD3803E:37b-25: phyi rol gyi lus ni rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi 'dus byas so //
T03TD3803E:37b-26: phyi nang gi lus ni lhag ma 'byung pa dang 'byung ba las gyur ba rang gi lus su gtogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-27: tshor ba la sogs pa yang lus la dmigs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum ste //
T03TD3803E:37b-28: tshor ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-29: chos ni sems las byung ba dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-30: lus la sogs pa la rjes su lta ba ni lus la sogs pa'o chos nyid la rjes su lta ba'o /
T03TD3803E:37b-31: lus la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni lus la sogs pa'i ming dang ldan pa'o //
T03TD3803E:37b-32: 'di ni bdag gi lus te bdag gi lus la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-0: de la yang mi dmigs pa'i tshus kyis rjes su lta ba ni @38a * //
T03TD3803E:38a-2: gus par byed pa dang rtag tu byed pa'i sbyor ba yin pas na brtun pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-3: rjes su lta ba dang shes bzhin gyi sbyor bas na shes bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:38a-4: mi brjed pa'i bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:38a-5: rgyun tu srung bar byed pa'i bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:38a-6: phyi rol du mi g-yeng bar /
T03TD3803E:38a-7: byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi dran pa ldan pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-8: 'di dag btson 'grus dang shes rab dang dran pa yin te //
T03TD3803E:38a-9: 'du dag gi phan yon bstan pa'i phyir 'jug rten la brnab sems dang //
T03TD3803E:38a-10: yid mi bde ba bsal te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:38a-11: bsal te zhes bya ba ni spangs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-12: 'jig rten ni 'jig rten gyi chos la'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-13: rnyed pa dang grags pa dang bstod pa la ni brnab sems so //
T03TD3803E:38a-14: ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang smad pa la ni yid mi bde ba'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-15: 'de dag yi shes yang dag par 'dzin pas na yang dag par 'dzin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-16: yang na yang dag par spang pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-17: de ni rnam pa bzhi ste/'di lta ste //
T03TD3803E:38a-18: mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do //
T03TD3803E:38a-22: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba dang //
T03TD3803E:38a-23: de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i chis rnam ma skyed pa mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang //
T03TD3803E:38a-24: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang //
T03TD3803E:38a-25: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir zhing 'byung ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-26: de la go cha'i btson 'grus kyis 'di ltar bya'o snyam pa'i 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-27: sbyor ba'i btson 'grus kyis ni 'bad do //
T03TD3803E:38a-28: skyo ba med pa'i btson 'grus kyis ni btson 'grus tsom mo //
T03TD3803E:38a-29: thabs kyi btson 'grus kyis ni yi shes rag tu 'jog go //
T03TD3803E:38a-30: de la bying ba la ni sems rab tu 'dzin bas mtho bar byed do //
T03TD3803E:38a-31: rgod ba la ni mngon par bsdus pas sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog go //
T03TD3803E:38a-32: rdzu 'khrul ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnams ni rdzu 'khrul gyi gnas pa yin pa'i phyir rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38a-33: de yang bzhi ste 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
T03TD3803E:38b-3: 'di ltar la la ni 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pas tse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin skyed do //
T03TD3803E:38b-4: la la ni yang dag par spong ba'i btson 'grus kyis mi dge ba'i tshogs mi skye pa nyid dang len par bstan to //
T03TD3803E:38b-5: la la ni gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid kyis sems yongs su 'dzin to //
T03TD3803E:38b-6: la la ni mi dge ba'i las phra mo yang dag par spyod dam 'on te yang dag par mi spyod ces gang bdag nyid yongs su dpyod pa de ni yang dag par nges par spong ngo //
T03TD3803E:38b-7: de dag gis kun nas dkrig pa thag ring du gyur nas bag nyal spang pa'i phyir gong du yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gis btson 'grus rtsom pa na spong pa'i 'du byed brgyad mngon par 'byung ba yin te //
T03TD3803E:38b-15: de la nam zhig bdag la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38b-16: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nges par 'joms pa ni brtson 'grus so //
T03TD3803E:38b-17: gong ma'i chos rtogs par bya ba la dad pa ni dad pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38b-18: de sngon du 'gro ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38b-19: de la zi gnas kyi phyogs dran pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38b-20: lhag mthong gi phyogs shes zhin no //
T03TD3803E:38b-21: de la sems mngon par 'du shes pa ni sems pa'o //
T03TD3803E:38b-22: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma pa ni btang snyoms so //
T03TD3803E:38b-23: 'dun pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong pa'o 'du byed dang ldan pa rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa de dben pa gnas pa dang //
T03TD3803E:38b-24: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa dang //
T03TD3803E:38b-26: rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed dom //
T03TD3803E:38b-27: de la dben pa ni nyon mongs pa las so //
T03TD3803E:38b-28: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni srid pa las so //
T03TD3803E:38b-30: rnam par spong ba ni phung po thams cad spangs pa ste //
T03TD3803E:38b-31: de ni rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba'o //
T03TD3803E:38b-32: dbang byed pa ni dbang po ste dad pa la sogs pa snga yin no //
T03TD3803E:38b-33: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bskyed pa la dbang thob pa'o phyir dbang po /
T03TD3803E:39a-1: dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar du'o //
T03TD3803E:39a-2: 'dzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i rtags mthong bas gong du khyad par gyi chos 'byung ba la re ba skyes te ston pa dang nyan thos kyi theg pa la yid ches pa skye'o //
T03TD3803E:39a-3: yid ches pa de gang du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
T03TD3803E:39a-4: dbang po'i stobs kyis kyang btson 'grus la sogs pa shin tu lhag par skye ste //
T03TD3803E:39a-5: des de zhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
T03TD3803E:39a-6: des na dbang po lngar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3803E:39a-7: dbang po lnga bsgom pa la ji ltar bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mi tshugs shing thub par dka' bas de ltar stobs zhes bya ba mang du 'gyur te //
T03TD3803E:39a-8: dad pa'i stobs nas shes rab kyi stobs kyi bar ro /
T03TD3803E:39a-9: mthong ba'i lam la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs na byang chub dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T03TD3803E:39a-10: de'i yan lag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te //
T03TD3803E:39a-11: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-12: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-13: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-14: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-15: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-16: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-17: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T03TD3803E:39a-18: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa bsum ni lhag mthong gi phogs so //
T03TD3803E:39a-21: btang snyoms ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs so //
T03TD3803E:39a-22: de dag thob pas bdag gis nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs bar mthong nas /
T03TD3803E:39a-23: bsgom pas spang bar bya bar bya ba de dag spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam phung po gsum du sgom par byed de //
T03TD3803E:39a-24: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-25: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-27: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang //
T03TD3803E:39a-29: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-0: yang @39b dag pa'i dran pa dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-1: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T03TD3803E:39b-2: de la dngos po gnyis dang yang dag par rtsol ba ni shes rab kyi phung po'o //
T03TD3803E:39b-3: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-4: yang dag ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'o //
T03TD3803E:39b-5: lhag ma ni tshul khrims kyi phung po ste //
T03TD3803E:39b-6: de yang dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las //
T03TD3803E:39b-7: rang bzhin yan lag gnas yan lag //
T03TD3803E:39b-9: bzhi pa phan yon yan lag yin //
T03TD3803E:39b-10: rnam gsum nyon mongs med yan lag //
T03TD3803E:39b-11: 'di la gzhi gnas gnas dang ni //
T03TD3803E:39b-12: ngo bo nyid du brtag yin //
T03TD3803E:39b-14: de la dran pa ni byang chub kyi gnas so //
T03TD3803E:39b-15: chos rnam par 'byed pa ni rang bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:39b-17: dga' ba ni phan yon no /
T03TD3803E:39b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi ste /
T03TD3803E:39b-19: de ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:39b-21: btang snyoms ni ngo bo nyed do //
T03TD3803E:39b-22: yongs su gcod dang go byed dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-23: rnam gsum gzhan yid ches par byed //
T03TD3803E:39b-24: mi mthun phogs kyi gnyen por ni //
T03TD3803E:39b-25: lan gyi yan lag de brgyad do //
T03TD3803E:39b-26: lta dang tshul khrims yo byad bsnyungs //
T03TD3803E:39b-27: gzhan la rnam par rig byed 'dod //
T03TD3803E:39b-28: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-29: mi mthun phyogs kyi gnyen po'o //
T03TD3803E:39b-30: de la mthong ba'i lam la yongs su gcod pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T03TD3803E:39b-31: gzhan gyi go bar byed pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:39b-32: yang dag pa'i ngag kun nas slong bar go bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
T03TD3803E:39b-33: gzhan yid ches par byed pa'i yan lag ni rnam gsum ste //
T03TD3803E:39b-35: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-37: de dag gis ni go rims bzhin du gsum la yid ches par gyur ro //
T03TD3803E:39b-38: gtang dang 'bel ba'i gtang rnam par nges pas shes rab la yid ches bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3803E:39b-39: mi bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir ni tshul khrims so //
T03TD3803E:39b-40: chos kyi rim par chos gos la sogs pa tshol ba ni yo byad bsnyungs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:39b-41: mi mthun pa'i gnyen po'i yan lag ni rnam pa gsum ste //
T03TD3803E:39b-42: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-43: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang //
T03TD3803E:39b-44: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to /
T03TD3803E:40a-0: @40a * // de dag ni go rims bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang //
T03TD3803E:40a-1: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bying ba dang //
T03TD3803E:40a-3: mi mthun pa'i phyogs khyad par can gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub pa la 'gegs byed pa'i gnyen po'o don to //
T03TD3803E:40a-4: de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa re re'i dbye ba yin te byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro //
T03TD3803E:40a-5: zad la mi skye ba'i ye shes ni byang chub po //
T03TD3803E:40a-6: de'i phyogs ni rjes su mthun pa ste de dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs so //
T03TD3803E:40a-7: de dag ni 'di la lam yin te thams cad kyang lam gyi tshogs te //
T03TD3803E:40a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:40a-11: gzungs zhes bya ba gcig gis tshig tu byas pa ni rigs kyi dbang du byas pa yin te //
T03TD3803E:40a-12: gzungs rnams ma lus gzungs kyi tshig go //
T03TD3803E:40a-13: aa ra pa tsa la sogs pa'i yi ge de dag la de'i don de bzhin nyid du 'jug par sgom par bsgom pa na bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na de'i don la bzod pa bskyed par 'gyur te //
T03TD3803E:40a-14: de ni bzod pa'i gzungs so //
T03TD3803E:40a-15: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bstan pa'i chos kyi phung po 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni chos kyi gzungs so //
T03TD3803E:40a-16: de nas de'i don 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni don gyi gzungs so //
T03TD3803E:40a-17: de nas sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sngags don yod pa ston pa la dbang ba ni sngags kyi gzungs te //
T03TD3803E:40a-18: de la aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la //
T03TD3803E:40a-20: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:40a-21: ji ltar shes shen chos thams cad thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:40a-22: gang gi phyir chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid nam mkha' dang //
T03TD3803E:40a-24: des ni skye ba med cing dang po nyid nas dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid nas kyang skye ba med pa yin te ;
T03TD3803E:40a-25: / de bas na de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa nyid kyis yi ge aa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:40a-26: yi ge ra'i sgo ni chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i phyir te //
T03TD3803E:40a-27: de bas na ji ltar nam mkha' la rdul gyis mi gos pa de bzhin du de yang nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis te //
T03TD3803E:40a-28: 'di ni yi ge ra'i don to //
T03TD3803E:40b-0: yi ge pa ni chos @40b thams cad kyi sgo ste don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir //
T03TD3803E:40b-1: 'di ni chos thams cad don dam par khyad par med do //
T03TD3803E:40b-2: de yang de bzhin nyid du de lta bu yin te //
T03TD3803E:40b-3: de ni med pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:40b-4: yi ge tsa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste //
T03TD3803E:40b-5: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pas 'di ni de bzhin nyid la 'chi ba dang skye ba med pa'i phyir tsa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:40b-6: yi ge na ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste ming dang bral bas na bdag gi ming med pa'i phyir na'i don to //
T03TD3803E:40b-7: de bzhin du yi ge la la sogs pa la de bzhin du rig par bya ste //
T03TD3803E:40b-8: de ni gzungs kyi tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:40b-9: sa bcu dang zhes bya ba ni //
T03TD3803E:40b-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'phag pa rnams kyis ni bcu ste //
T03TD3803E:40b-11: de dag ni sa'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:40b-12: de yang rab tu dga' dang //
T03TD3803E:40b-13: dri ma med dang 'od 'phro ba dang //
T03TD3803E:40b-14: sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du 'gyur ba dang //
T03TD3803E:40b-19: de la gang dang po la bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pas rab tu dga' ba ste //
T03TD3803E:40b-20: des byang chub sems dpa' 'di rab tu dga' ba'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-21: de nas 'di la tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma dang bral ba de ba na dri ma med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-22: gang gi phyir 'di la ting nge 'dzin ma nyams pa la brten nas chos snang ba de bas na 'od byed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-23: gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs kyis nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg pa de bas na 'od 'phro ba'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-24: gang gi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma rig pa dang bden pa'i shes pa phan tshun 'gal ba dka' bas sbyong bar byed pa de bas na sbyang dka' ba'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-25: gang gi phyir 'di la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du 'gyur zhing gnas pa de bas na mngon du gyur pa'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-26: gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs dang //
T03TD3803E:40b-28: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs nas mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa de bas na ring du song ba'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-29: gang gi phyir 'di la de nyid rang gi ngang gi 'byung ba'i phyir mi g-yo pa'o //
T03TD3803E:40b-30: gang gi phyir 'di la so so yang dag par rig pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' legs par ston pas legs pa'i blo gros so //
T03TD3803E:41a-0: gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal @41a * //
T03TD3803E:41a-1: tshab du dbang bskur ba de bas na chos kyi sprin no //
T03TD3803E:41a-2: 'di dag re re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:41a-3: de la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcur yang bya ba yin te bcu gang zhe na /
T03TD3803E:41a-13: ye shes te 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o //
T03TD3803E:41a-14: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgo nas nye bar bsags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03TD3803E:41a-15: thabs des de mi zad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:41a-17: byang chub bsngos pa'i dge ba ni //
T03TD3803E:41a-18: byang chub bar du zad pa med //
T03TD3803E:41a-19: rgya mtshor chu thigs gtor ba yang //
T03TD3803E:41a-20: 'jig pa'i bskal bar gnas pa bzhin //
T03TD3803E:41a-22: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:41a-23: gang gi skye ba thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41a-25: so sor brtags pa'i stobs dang /
T03TD3803E:41a-27: skad cig re re la de dag spyod pa ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41a-28: dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin nam sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par theg pa chen po yongs su shes pa ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41a-29: sa rnams ni sa bcu pa la sogs pa las rgyas par bstan to //
T03TD3803E:41a-30: sa sbyong ba ni yang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag la brtags pa dang /
T03TD3803E:41a-31: rjes su bstan pa yin no /
T03TD3803E:41a-32: / sa rnams sbyong ba'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:41a-33: bstan bcos las tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:41a-34: de dag kyang sa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:41a-35: yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis //
T03TD3803E:41a-37: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:41a-38: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
T03TD3803E:41a-39: gtong dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang //
T03TD3803E:41a-40: dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang //
T03TD3803E:41a-41: rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:41a-42: sangs rgyas bkur bstod dga' ba dang //
T03TD3803E:41a-43: chos bstan pa dang bden pa yi //
T03TD3803E:41a-44: tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod //
T03TD3803E:41b-0: 'di dag rang bzhin mi @41b dmigs pas //
T03TD3803E:41b-1: yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya //
T03TD3803E:41b-2: zhes bya ba la rnam pa bcu ni rnam pa bcu ste //
T03TD3803E:41b-3: de yang bsam pa la sogs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:41b-4: bsam pa ni dad pa dang 'dun pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-5: phan pa'i dngos po ni thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o rgyu nyid ni 'di la sems can rnams la sems mnyam pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:41b-6: gtong ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-7: tshol ba ni yongs su tshol ba'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-8: de yang dam pa'i chos rnams la dmigs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:41b-9: chos yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:41b-10: nges par 'byung ba ni khyim gyi gnas nas nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-11: nges par 'byung ba de la sems pa nyid de 'dod pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:41b-12: dga' ba zhes bya ba la yang 'dir rtag tu zhes bya ba rjes su sbyor ro //
T03TD3803E:41b-13: bden pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni bden pa'i ngag ste de dag ni bcu'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-14: 'di dag ces bya ba ni bsam pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-15: tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod //
T03TD3803E:41b-16: rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che //
T03TD3803E:41b-17: bkur sti gus par nyan pa dang //
T03TD3803E:41b-18: brgyad pa sbyin la sogs la brtson //
T03TD3803E:41b-19: zhes bya ba la tshul khrims ni tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-20: bzod pa ni bzod pa'i stobs so //
T03TD3803E:41b-21: rab tu dga' ba nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-22: sems can thams cad yongs so ma btang ba ni snying brtse ba chen po'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-23: bkur sti ni bkur bar bya bar 'os pa'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-24: gus par nyan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten pa'i 'du shes so //
T03TD3803E:41b-25: sbyin pa la sogs pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa dag la'o //
T03TD3803E:41b-26: brgyad pa smos pa de ni yongs su sbyangs pa gnyis pa nyid brgyad yin no //
T03TD3803E:41b-27: thos pas mi ngoms nyid dang ni //
T03TD3803E:41b-28: zang zing med par chos sbyin dang //
T03TD3803E:41b-29: sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang //
T03TD3803E:41b-30: 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang //
T03TD3803E:41b-31: ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba //
T03TD3803E:41b-32: rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga //
T03TD3803E:41b-33: zhes bya ba la thos pas zhes bya ba ni mang du thos pas so //
T03TD3803E:41b-34: zhing kun sbyong zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag par ro //
T03TD3803E:41b-35: de la de dag nyid bsod nams yongs su bsngo bas rlom sems med pa'i bdag nyid de des rlom pa med pas de rnam lnga zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T03TD3803E:41b-36: yongs su sbyong ba lnga pa ni gsum pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:41b-37: nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang //
T03TD3803E:41b-38: sbyang pa yang dag sdom bsten dang //
T03TD3803E:42a-2: 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42a-3: mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong //
T03TD3803E:42a-4: mi zhum pa dang lta ba med //
T03TD3803E:42a-6: nags gnas ni dgon pa na gnas pa 'am yang na de byed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-7: chog shes pa ni yang dag par dga' ba'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-8: sbyangs pa yang sdom bsten dang //
T03TD3803E:42a-9: zhes bya ba ni mi gtong ba'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-10: smod pa zhes bya ba ni skyo ba'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-11: bdog kun gtong zhes bya ba ni bdog pa thams cad gtong ba'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-12: mi zhum pa dang lta ba med //
T03TD3803E:42a-13: ces bya ba ni ma zhum pa'i sems nyid dang dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med ste /
T03TD3803E:42a-14: zhum pa med pa dang bag 'khums pa med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:42a-15: rnam pa bcu po 'og nas bshad pa dag kyang 'dis rjes su 'brang ste /
T03TD3803E:42a-16: des na yongs su sbyong ba bcu po nyid ni bzhi pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:42a-19: bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42a-20: mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang //
T03TD3803E:42a-21: rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log //
T03TD3803E:42a-22: yid gnyis dang ni nyon mongs bzod //
T03TD3803E:42a-23: bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs na //
T03TD3803E:42a-24: sa lnga pa ni yang dag thob /
T03TD3803E:42a-26: 'dris pa ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag dang /
T03TD3803E:42a-27: khyim la 'khren pa ni khyim du song nas ser na byed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-28: 'du 'dzir gyur pa ni gtam mi 'dra ba sna tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:42a-29: bstod pa stod par byed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-31: las kyi lam ni las lam mo //
T03TD3803E:42a-32: rlom pa ni mtho bar sems pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-33: khengs pa ni bla ma rnams la lus kyis mi 'dud pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-34: phyin ci log ni phyin ci log gi don 'dzin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-35: yid gnyis ni the tshom mo //
T03TD3803E:42a-36: nyon mongs pa bzod pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi bag chags lhag par bsgo ba ste /
T03TD3803E:42a-37: de dag ni 'dris pa la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42a-38: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod btson 'grus //
T03TD3803E:42a-39: bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas //
T03TD3803E:42a-40: slob ma dang ni bse ru la //
T03TD3803E:42a-41: dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs pa //
T03TD3803E:42a-42: bslangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun //
T03TD3803E:42a-43: btang yang mi dga' med pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42a-44: dbul yang slong ba mi spong las //
T03TD3803E:42a-45: sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob //
T03TD3803E:42a-47: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re res rab tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni drug go //
T03TD3803E:42a-48: nyan thos la dga' ba dang /
T03TD3803E:42b-0: rang sangs rgyas @42b la dga' ba dang /
T03TD3803E:42b-1: skrag pa'i sems yongs su spangs ba de dag ni gsum mo //
T03TD3803E:42b-2: bslangs nas mi zhum pa'i sems nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:42b-3: bdog pa kun btang yang mi dga' ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:42b-4: dbul yang slong ba mi spong ba de ni gsum ste chos bcu gnyis po de dag gis ni sa drug pa thob pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:42b-5: bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-6: srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-7: mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-8: khams dang skye mched dag dang ni //
T03TD3803E:42b-9: khams gsum pa dang chags gnas dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-10: sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-11: dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-12: der lta ba la mngon zhen dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-13: stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-14: de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni //
T03TD3803E:42b-15: nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa //
T03TD3803E:42b-16: de yis sa ni bdun pa 'thob //
T03TD3803E:42b-17: rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-18: 'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-19: snying rje dang ni rlom sems med //
T03TD3803E:42b-20: chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes //
T03TD3803E:42b-21: mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-22: chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston //
T03TD3803E:42b-23: rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-24: 'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong //
T03TD3803E:42b-25: zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-26: lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-27: sems dul ba dang thams cad la //
T03TD3803E:42b-28: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3803E:42b-29: chags pa'i sa min gang 'dod par //
T03TD3803E:42b-30: zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang //
T03TD3803E:42b-31: kun tu bdag gi ngo bo ni //
T03TD3803E:42b-32: ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o //
T03TD3803E:42b-33: gnyis pa nyi shu'i sgra la ni yon tan nyi shus lhag pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:42b-34: yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni lhag ma ste /
T03TD3803E:42b-35: bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa nyes pa nyi shu'o //
T03TD3803E:42b-37: gang la rnam par chad pa ni rab tu nyams pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42b-38: rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang /
T03TD3803E:42b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang yon tan nyi shu yongs su rdzogs pas ni sa bdun pa thob pa yin no zhes mdor bsdus pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:42b-40: 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa'o //
T03TD3803E:42b-41: de'i khyad par ni bdag la sogs pa nas skye mched kyi bar du'o //
T03TD3803E:42b-42: rtag pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i dbye ba yin te /
T03TD3803E:42b-43: rnam par dbye ba bdun par byas so //
T03TD3803E:42b-44: dkon mchog gsum dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sangs rgyas dkon mchog la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas dkon mchog la sogs pa la lta ba'i bar du'o //
T03TD3803E:43a-0: @43a * // de la mngon par zhen pa ni nges pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43a-2: de dang 'gal ba ni stong pa nyid la gnod pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43a-3: mnyam pa ni lhan cig pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:43a-4: de la nyes pa bstan pa'i don ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang sems can du 'dzin pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-14: khams gsum pa la rnam par gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-15: khams gsum la chags pa dang ;
T03TD3803E:43a-16: sangs rgyas la lta ba la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-17: chos la lta ba la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-18: dge 'dun la lta ba la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-19: tshul khrims la lta ba la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-20: stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yid 'byung ba dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-21: stong pa nyid la 'gal ba dag go //
T03TD3803E:43a-22: yon tan rjes su ston pa'i don ni ston pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-23: mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byed pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-24: smon pa med pa shes pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-25: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-26: snying rje ni sems can thams cad la brtse ba'o //
T03TD3803E:43a-27: de dag la yang rlom sems med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43a-28: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-29: theg pa yang dag par rab tu rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-30: mi skye ba la bzod pa'i shes pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-31: theg pa gcig tu ston pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-32: chos thams cad kyi rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-35: nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-36: zhi gnas la nges par sems pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-37: lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-38: sems dul ba dang/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-39: chags pa med pa'i sa ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-40: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3803E:43a-41: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der yang bdag gi ngo bo yang dag par ston pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43a-42: sems can kun yid shes pa dang //
T03TD3803E:43a-43: mngon par shes pas brtse pa dang //
T03TD3803E:43a-44: sangs rgyas zhing bzang sgrub pa dang //
T03TD3803E:43a-45: yongs su brtag phyir sangs rgyas brten //
T03TD3803E:43a-46: dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi //
T03TD3803E:43a-47: zhing sbyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang //
T03TD3803E:43b-0: bsam bzhin srid pa len @43b pa dang //
T03TD3803E:43b-1: las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad //
T03TD3803E:43b-2: bzang sgrub ces bya bar sbyar te yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:43b-3: rnam brgyad ces bya ba'i tshig gis ni rnam pa brgyad nyid de yongs su sbyangs pa brgyad pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43b-5: sems can thams cad kyi sems shes ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-6: mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgrub pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-8: sangs rgyas rnams la brten pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-9: yongs su brtag pa gcig tu byas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-10: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ring nge 'dzin la yang dang yang du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-12: srid par bsams bzhin du skye ba'o //
T03TD3803E:43b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:43b-14: dang po ni snod kyi 'jig rten phyi ma ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
T03TD3803E:43b-15: smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang //
T03TD3803E:43b-16: lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang ;
T03TD3803E:43b-17: / spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang //
T03TD3803E:43b-18: mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni //
T03TD3803E:43b-19: rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang //
T03TD3803E:43b-20: 'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni //
T03TD3803E:43b-21: nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams kyi //
T03TD3803E:43b-22: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin //
T03TD3803E:43b-23: brgyad kyi 'og tu dgu ba yin te /
T03TD3803E:43b-24: de'i yongs su sbyong ba ni bcu gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:43b-25: smon lam mtha' yas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-26: lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang //
T03TD3803E:43b-27: spobs pa chi bo lta bu dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-28: mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-29: rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-30: rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-31: cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-33: skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-34: nges par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-35: byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:43b-36: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43b-37: sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni //
T03TD3803E:43b-38: gang gi sangs rgyas sar gnas pa //
T03TD3803E:43b-39: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa //
T03TD3803E:43b-40: bcu ba yin par shes par bya //
T03TD3803E:43b-41: sa dgu ni rigs la sogs pa'i sa'o //
T03TD3803E:43b-42: de la rigs kyi sa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rigs can no //
T03TD3803E:43b-43: brgyad pa'i sa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:43b-44: mthong ba'i sa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-2: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-3: bya ba byas so zhes khong du chud pa'i phyir de'i sa ni byas rtogs pa can gyi sa'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-4: nyan thos kyi sa ni nyan thos kho na rnam pa drug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o ;
T03TD3803E:44a-6: / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni sngar bshad pa'i sa rnams so //
T03TD3803E:44a-7: sa dgu po 'di dag 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes gang gis sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu ba'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-8: de dag ni sa'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:44a-9: gnyen po'i tshogs kyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:44a-10: mthong dang goms pa'i lam dag la //
T03TD3803E:44a-11: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnams //
T03TD3803E:44a-12: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03TD3803E:44a-13: gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya //
T03TD3803E:44a-16: gzung ba ni mthong ba'i lam la gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:44a-17: dngos po tsam la gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:44a-19: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:44a-20: gang zag rdzas la brten pa dang //
T03TD3803E:44a-21: gang zag rdzas la btags pa'i gzhi la brten pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-22: de dag ni bsgom pa'i lam la yang ngo //
T03TD3803E:44a-23: brgyad po 'di dag spang ba'i phyir gnyen po brgyad ni gnyen po'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:44a-24: de la mthong ba'i lam ni de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:44a-26: rmi lam la sogs pa'i gzung ba'i dngos po yang dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
T03TD3803E:44a-27: de'i chos nyid la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa ni de'i gnyen po'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-28: sbyin pa la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi gnyen po'i dngos bo la dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-29: mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-30: dgra bcom pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa dang gang zag gi rdzas rnams la dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o /
T03TD3803E:44a-31: mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-32: ming dang brda dang tha snyad la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44a-33: mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o //
T03TD3803E:44b-0: bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa med pa ma yin pa ni chos thams cad gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis te chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis zhes bya @44b ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:44b-1: de dag ni gzung ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44b-2: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i gnyen po'i dngos po ni mi dmigs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:44b-3: rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa gang zag gi rdzas mi dmigs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:44b-4: rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:44b-5: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gang zag btags pa'i gzhi rnams la dmigs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:44b-6: de dag mi gnyen po'i tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:44b-7: tshogs kyi sgrub pa rdzogs so /
T03TD3803E:44b-9: // /'dir nges bar 'byung bas na nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i skabs so //
T03TD3803E:44b-10: de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:44b-11: ched du byas dang mnyam nyid dang ;
T03TD3803E:44b-12: / sems can don dang 'bad med dang //
T03TD3803E:44b-13: shin tu nges bar 'byung ba dang //
T03TD3803E:44b-14: thob pa'i mtshan nyid nges 'byung dang //
T03TD3803E:44b-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:44b-16: nges 'byung lam gyi spyod yul can //
T03TD3803E:44b-17: rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid 'dir //
T03TD3803E:44b-18: nges 'byung sgrub pa yin zhes bya //
T03TD3803E:44b-20: /'di nyid de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:44b-21: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes bya ba ni ci zhig gsol ba yin zhe /
T03TD3803E:44b-22: theg pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T03TD3803E:44b-23: gang gi phyir 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas byang chub sems dpa' nges bar 'byung bar gyur to //
T03TD3803E:44b-24: de'i phyir theg pa 'di theg pa chen po zhes brjod do //
T03TD3803E:44b-25: de ci'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhe na /
T03TD3803E:44b-26: des bdag nyid chen po mi thob pa thob pa'i phyir ro /
T03TD3803E:44b-27: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:44b-28: sems can gyi tshogs kyi mchog nyid du sgrub pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:44b-30: spong ba chen po nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:44b-31: rtogs pa chen po nyid kyi chen po yin te de ltar 'di ni ched du bya ba'i nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:44b-32: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis de theg pa chen po yin te /
T03TD3803E:44b-33: de bas na theg pa de ni theb pa chen po zhes brjod do zhes sbyor ro //
T03TD3803E:44b-34: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la ji ltar mnyam pa nyid yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:44b-35: ji ltar nam mkha' la phyogs kyi bye brag med de kha dog ma yin /
T03TD3803E:45a-1: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin /
T03TD3803E:45a-2: gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa ma yin /
T03TD3803E:45a-3: gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:45a-4: theg pa chen po yang de bzhin te /
T03TD3803E:45a-5: de bas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis de ni theg pa chen po yin te ;
T03TD3803E:45a-6: de'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyis nges bar 'byung ba yin no //
T03TD3803E:45a-7: ji ltar nam mkha' la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nam mkha' ni go skabs 'byed pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:45a-8: theg pa chen po la go skabs yod pa des na de dag 'byed pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
T03TD3803E:45a-10: phyogs su yongs su chad pa med pas tshad med grangs med dpag med pa ste /
T03TD3803E:45a-11: rnam grangs 'dis zhes bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis so //
T03TD3803E:45a-12: 'di lta sems can 'di snyed kyi go skabs 'byed pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:45a-13: gang gi phyir sems can med pas nam mkha' med do //
T03TD3803E:45a-14: nam mkha' med pas theg pa chen po med do //
T03TD3803E:45a-15: theg pa chen po med pas chos thams cad med do //
T03TD3803E:45a-16: de bas na sems can dang /
T03TD3803E:45a-19: chos thams cad kyi gzugs su med pa /
T03TD3803E:45a-20: bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa /
T03TD3803E:45a-21: mtshan nyid gcig pas 'di lta ste /
T03TD3803E:45a-23: de ltar de snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi go 'byed pa na theg pa chen po yin te /
T03TD3803E:45a-24: de bas de ni sems can nges par 'byong ba'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-25: 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03TD3803E:45a-27: nges par 'gro bas na nges par 'gro ba'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-28: gnas pa ni 'gro ba las ldog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-29: theg pa chen po la gsum po de dag med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-30: gang gi phyir chos thams cad ni g-yo ba med pa ste /
T03TD3803E:45a-31: gang gi phyir de dag rang bzhin gyis gang du yang 'gro ba med cing gang nas kyang 'ong 'ong ba med gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de /
T03TD3803E:45a-32: gyo ba dang 'gul ba des 'bad pa med pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-33: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya la sogs pa la /
T03TD3803E:45a-34: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' nyid do //
T03TD3803E:45a-35: 'di la zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po la'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-36: sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i dus so //
T03TD3803E:45a-37: phyi ma'i mthar zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-38: dbus zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:45a-39: gsum po 'di yang theg pa chen po la mi dmigs te /
T03TD3803E:45b-0: de ni dus @45b gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste de bas na theg pa chen po'o //
T03TD3803E:45b-1: ji ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:45b-2: gang gi phyir 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong /
T03TD3803E:45b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong /
T03TD3803E:45b-4: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ste /
T03TD3803E:45b-5: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis so //
T03TD3803E:45b-6: theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong /
T03TD3803E:45b-7: byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong /
T03TD3803E:45b-8: stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa'am /
T03TD3803E:45b-9: da ltar byung ba med do //
T03TD3803E:45b-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa med do //
T03TD3803E:45b-11: rnam par byang ba med do //
T03TD3803E:45b-13: mya ngan las 'das pa med do //
T03TD3803E:45b-14: de bas na theg pa de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:45b-15: de ni bstan du med pas shin tu nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:45b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:45b-17: 'dir rab 'byor gyis theg pa chen po'i sgra'i don bstan pa la /
T03TD3803E:45b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas /
T03TD3803E:45b-19: 'di la bslabs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba'i skabs ston to //
T03TD3803E:45b-20: 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen nyid do //
T03TD3803E:45b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas nas theg pa chen po'i ston pa ni skabs ma yin pa nyid kyis gzhan dag gis dogs pa spang ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:45b-22: gang pos sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan no //
T03TD3803E:45b-23: rjes su mthun par ston to zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir khyod kyis chos thams cad dang theg pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid ston pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes te /
T03TD3803E:45b-24: de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:45b-25: de bas na rjes su mthun par ston to zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T03TD3803E:45b-26: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skabs nyid kyis ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:45b-27: de la thob pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi bye brag gis tshig bcu gnyis smras so //
T03TD3803E:45b-28: de nas de gnyis kyi khyad par bstan pa'i don du ni yang gi sgra'o //
T03TD3803E:45b-29: de la gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dang po'i tshig bstan to //
T03TD3803E:45b-30: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-1: byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-2: bcom ldan 'das de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-3: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-4: ji ltar bdag ces bgyi ba la sogs pas ni drug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-5: chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa zhes bya bas ni bdun pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-6: gang gzung du ma mchis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brgyad pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-7: de ltar chos de dag zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dgu pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-8: de ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcu pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-9: bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcu gcig pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-10: gal te de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bcu gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46a-11: brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa'i goms pa mthar thug pa ni mngon par zhen pa skye ba ni gzhan gyi dbang ste /
T03TD3803E:46a-12: de rnam pa thams cad du ldog pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thob pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:46a-14: yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:46a-15: 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi theg pa chen po 'di la 'das pa dang /
T03TD3803E:46a-16: ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslabs nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob bo //
T03TD3803E:46a-18: rjes su thob bo zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:46a-19: de la sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:46a-20: de bas na sems can med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:46a-21: chos thams cad med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:46a-22: byang chub sems dpa' med pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:46a-23: de ltar sems can med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:46a-24: chos thams cad med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:46a-25: byang chub sems dpa' med pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /
T03TD3803E:46a-27: dbus 'di dag thams cad gnyis su byar med de de bas na sngon gyi mtha' la sogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' nye bar ma mchis zhes bya ba 'di ni dang po'i don to //
T03TD3803E:46a-28: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba la sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de gang las she na /
T03TD3803E:46a-29: gtan tshigs ni gzugs su ma mchis zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:46a-30: gzugs la sogs pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:46b-0: gang gi phyir gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brten pa des na 'di dag @46b ni mu ma mchis pa ste /
T03TD3803E:46b-1: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus kyi mtha' dang bral ba nyid do //
T03TD3803E:46b-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:46b-3: gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03TD3803E:46b-4: nye bar mi mchi zhes bya ba ni nye bar mi 'gro ba ste /
T03TD3803E:46b-5: gang gi phyir 'di dag kyang med cing mi dmigs te /
T03TD3803E:46b-6: gzugs la sogs pa stong pa nyid la brten pa gang gi phyir stong pa nyid dang gzugs la sogs pa spang ba yod pa ma yin zhing byang chub sems dpa' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:46b-7: de ltar zhes bya ba ni gzugs su snang ba na'o //
T03TD3803E:46b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:46b-9: thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi bye brag gis thams cad do //
T03TD3803E:46b-10: thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin thams cad de yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde tshan no //
T03TD3803E:46b-11: yang thams cad ces bya ba ni sde tshan de thams cad la re re zhing yang thams cad do //
T03TD3803E:46b-12: rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rang rang gi phan tshun thams cad mi dmigs pa ste de dag stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:46b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo //
T03TD3803E:46b-14: bcom ldan 'das de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos de zhes bya ba ni skabs kyi byang chub sems dpa' zhes rtogs par byed pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:46b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo //
T03TD3803E:46b-16: chos gang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o //
T03TD3803E:46b-17: chos gang gis zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bas so //
T03TD3803E:46b-18: chos gang la zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba thob par bya ba'o //
T03TD3803E:46b-19: gdams par bgyi zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
T03TD3803E:46b-20: gang zhig gang gis gang du zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:46b-21: de bzhin du gdams pa med pas rjes su sgrub pa med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:46b-22: gang zhig gang la gang du thob pa med //
T03TD3803E:46b-23: ces bya ba ni bzhi pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:46b-24: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:46b-25: ming tsam zhes bya ba ni don gyis stong pa ni ming ste /
T03TD3803E:47a-0: de'i phyir don med pa'i ngo bo @47a * //
T03TD3803E:47a-2: brda'i snga rol du don tsam du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:47a-3: ming la yang don gyi rang gi ngo bo med de don mi shes pa yang ming tsam shes pa yod do //
T03TD3803E:47a-4: don med kyang sgra sbyor ba'i phyir ming don med do //
T03TD3803E:47a-5: de nyid kyi phyir ming de yang mngon par ma grub ste /
T03TD3803E:47a-6: ming nyid mngon par ma grub po //
T03TD3803E:47a-7: des na byang chub sems dpa'i ming mngon par ma grub pa dang /
T03TD3803E:47a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming mngon par ma grub pas thob pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lnga pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:47a-9: de ltar re zhig tshig lngas ni chos bdag med pa'i sgo dang /
T03TD3803E:47a-10: ming tsam gyi sgo nas btags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa dgag pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:47a-11: gang zag la bdag med pa'i sgo nas de dgag pa'i phyir ni tshig drug pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:47a-12: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdag bdag la zhes gsungs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:47a-13: bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3803E:47a-14: shin tu zhes bya ba ni tshig tu mngon par ma grub pa yin te de ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:47a-15: mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa de bzhin du sgra dang skabs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:47a-16: de bzhin du chos thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' yang med pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:47a-17: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo med dpa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:47a-19: de bzhin du chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la zhes bya ba la 'di gang las shes she na /
T03TD3803E:47a-20: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma chen mo dag las rab 'byor gyi tshig bcu gnyis kyis bstan te /
T03TD3803E:47a-21: des na bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi ming dang rgyu thob pa la /
T03TD3803E:47a-22: sh'a ri'i bus dri ba byas pa la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gtan tshigs kyi rim pas bshad pa ni tshig bdun pa la /
T03TD3803E:47a-23: rgyu gang gis tshig rnams ngo bo nyid med pa 'dri ba la rjes su dris pa ni ngo bo nyid med pas gtan tshigs bstan nas /
T03TD3803E:47a-24: sh'a ri'i bus rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa yin no zhes mjug bsdu bar byas so //
T03TD3803E:47a-25: de nas 'dir yang shes par bya ba ni 'dri ba dang /
T03TD3803E:47a-29: de ni don gyis shes bar bya ba yin gyi ched du bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:47b-0: ched du bstan na ni bdun pa'i tshig @47b phal cher nyams par 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:47b-1: gang gi phyir tshig bdun pa nyams pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:47b-2: dus kyis byung ba ni tshig 'og ma dang tshig gcig tu 'gyur ba ni nyams pa dang po'o //
T03TD3803E:47b-3: tshig tu byas pa'i don la rnam par dbye ba dang po bsal nas drug pa'i rnam par dbye ba byas pa ni nyams pa gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:47b-4: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba bsal nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa zhes brjod pa ni nyams pa gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:47b-6: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gzhan dbang gi ngo bos so //
T03TD3803E:47b-7: 'di dag la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yin pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de chos thams cad do //
T03TD3803E:47b-9: 'dus pa las byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo ni med de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:47b-10: rgyud nye bar gnas pa ni 'dus pa'o //
T03TD3803E:47b-11: de la gang yang yod pa de ni 'dus pa las byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:47b-12: 'dus pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni rang gi ngo bo med de rgyu dang bral ba yod na med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:47b-13: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:47b-14: phyi nas med de yod pa dag ni phyi nas med par mi rigs te 'gal ba de bas na skad cig gcig nyid la dngos po gang yin pa de ni skad cig las gzhan du rang gi ngo bo med de /
T03TD3803E:47b-15: de bas na dngos po med pa de dag gi rang gi ngo bo yin no //
T03TD3803E:47b-16: gzhan yang gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin la /
T03TD3803E:47b-17: sdug bsngal ba la yang spang bar bya ba yin no //
T03TD3803E:47b-18: de na yang 'di dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yin te /
T03TD3803E:47b-19: de'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang gis rang gi ngo bos kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni bdun pa'i don yin no //
T03TD3803E:47b-20: dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid brtags pa 'dis kyang gzugs la sogs pa thob pa ma yin nam /
T03TD3803E:47b-21: gang gi phyir rdza mkhan gyis bum pa dang /
T03TD3803E:47b-22: tha ga pas ras la sogs pa bskyod par snang ngo zhe na /
T03TD3803E:47b-23: des na gzugs de gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03TD3803E:47b-24: brtags pa'i gzugs la sogs pa gang mngon par grub pa de gang lags zhes bya ba ni/ ci yang med pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:47b-25: brtag pa thams cad ni 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48a-0: @48a * // de nyid kyi phyir rjes su bstan pa'i tshig ni rab 'byor gyis rigs pa smas pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:48a-1: chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas yin te 'di ni 'du byed med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:48a-2: rdza mkhan dang tha ga pa la sogs pa yang brtags pa yin pas med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T03TD3803E:48a-3: / de bas na brtags pa la skye ba dang /
T03TD3803E:48a-4: 'gag pa la sogs pa bkag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48a-5: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di las ni brtags pa'i gzung ba yang bkag pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:48a-6: de ni byis pas gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:48a-7: brgyad pa'i 'og tu tshig gsum gyis yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo'i dbang du byas nas de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03TD3803E:48a-8: de ltar zhes bya ba 'di ltar brtags pa'i rang gi ngo bos so //
T03TD3803E:48a-9: de dag gi zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bos so //
T03TD3803E:48a-10: gang rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa'o //
T03TD3803E:48a-11: de ni yongs su ma grub pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48a-12: gal te de lta na de'i tshe chos nyid las chos can tha dad pa med pa'i 'khrul par zad na stong pa nyid kyang zad pa yin la /
T03TD3803E:48a-13: ci ste stong pa nyid ni brtag pa yin na de'i tshe de dang tha mi dad pas 'khrul pa 'khrul par yang brtag par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03TD3803E:48a-14: gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03TD3803E:48a-15: gang yang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo de ni 'khrul pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:48a-16: de nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:48a-17: gzhan dbang tha mi dad pa bkag pa ni dgu pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48a-18: de ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas tha mi dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir te ci zhes smos te /
T03TD3803E:48a-19: de'i tshe ji ltar mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid tsam gyi byang chub sems dpas so //
T03TD3803E:48a-20: mngon par ma grub pa la zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid tsam gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing gang gis kyang ma yin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:48a-21: gang gi phyir skye ba med pa la gdams par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tha dad pa bkag pa ni bcu pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48a-23: gzhan dbang gi ngo bo ni 'khrul ba nyid de'i 'khrul pa ldog pa de'i tshe stong pa nyid kyi gzhi ci zhig yin /
T03TD3803E:48a-24: ci ste gzhi med na de ltar na gang zhig chos nyid yin /
T03TD3803E:48b-0: ri bong gi rva @48b dang 'di khyad par ci zhig yod /
T03TD3803E:48b-1: ri bong gi rva dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa ni gang zhig yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:48b-2: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:48b-3: chos thams cad dam zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa shes par bya ba rnams so ;
T03TD3803E:48b-4: / sangs rgyas kyi chos sam zhes bya ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T03TD3803E:48b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam zhes bya ba ni sngar thob pa'i yon tan rnams so //
T03TD3803E:48b-6: gang yang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa yang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03TD3803E:48b-7: 'di dag thams cad ni thob pa'i dus na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na stong pa nyid tha dad par mi dmigs te /
T03TD3803E:48b-8: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pa las tha mi dad cing thams cad stong pa nyid bzhin du de'i tshe snang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48b-10: gang 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
T03TD3803E:48b-12: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs dang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings bzhin du rtag par snang ba yin te /
T03TD3803E:48b-13: de'i chos nyid de ni ji srid gzhan gyi dbang yod pa de srid du chos nyid ces brjod do //
T03TD3803E:48b-14: phyi nas gzhan na sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi sku sangs rgyas brjod do //
T03TD3803E:48b-15: de ni 'dir bcu gcig pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:48b-16: bcu gnyis pa'i tshig ni gal te zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T03TD3803E:48b-17: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan te /
T03TD3803E:48b-18: 'dir sems mi zhum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig lngas ni zhi gnas rnam pa lnga bstan to //
T03TD3803E:48b-19: ci'i phyir bcom par mi bgyid ces bya ba'i tshig gcig gis rnam pa bzhi brjod de zhi bar byed /
T03TD3803E:48b-21: rgyun gcig tu byed sems mnyam par 'jog par byed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:48b-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi sems la 'di dag med na yan lag lngar thal bar 'gyur bas des na bzhi po de nyid kyi phyir bcom pa bkag pas yid phyir bcom par mi bgyid ces bya ba yin te /
T03TD3803E:48b-23: de ltar tshig drug gis zhi gnas rnam pa dgu bstan to //
T03TD3803E:48b-24: yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa'i snang ba ni gsal ba'o //
T03TD3803E:48b-25: gsal ba de la skrag par mi byed pa ni mi skrag pa ste /
T03TD3803E:49a-0: des ni mi skrag ces bya ba'i tshig gcig gis ni @49a * //
T03TD3803E:49a-2: mi dngang shin tu dngang bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis ni zung du 'brel ba'i lam bstan to //
T03TD3803E:49a-3: de'i phyir mi dngang ba zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin las mi dngang ba yin te /
T03TD3803E:49a-4: de med pa'i phyir de ni zhi gnas kyi yan lag go //
T03TD3803E:49a-5: yang dag pa'i ye shes las dngangs pa ni shin tu dngangs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:49a-6: de mi skye ba ni lhag mthong gi yan lag go //
T03TD3803E:49a-7: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T03TD3803E:49a-8: lhag ma ni rjes su brtag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:49a-9: bsgom pa'o zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas kyis so //
T03TD3803E:49a-10: nye bar dmigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni nye bar rtog pa ni nges par sems pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:49a-11: zung du 'brel pa'i lam gyis so //
T03TD3803E:49a-12: de ni bcu gnyis pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:49a-13: 'di'i 'thad par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bcu gsum pas bstan pa ni /
T03TD3803E:49a-14: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba ni bris pa'o //
T03TD3803E:49a-15: lan ni bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe zhes bya ba la chos 'di dag ces bya ba ni chos thams cad do //
T03TD3803E:49a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du gyur pa'o //
T03TD3803E:49a-17: gzugs brtags pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar dang /
T03TD3803E:49a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni nye bar mi dmigs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:49a-19: des snang ba med pa'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro ba'o //
T03TD3803E:49a-20: nye bar mi rig ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ste /
T03TD3803E:49a-21: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:49a-22: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa bkag pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:49a-23: khyad par gyis rnam par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa skye ba dang 'gag pa med de gzugs la sogs pa sngar ni skyes pa dang da ltar ni 'gag pa yin no zhes mi mthong ste /
T03TD3803E:49a-24: gang gi phyir brtag pa ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'gag pa med de de bas na gnyis ka yang mi mthong ngo //
T03TD3803E:49a-25: gzhan dbang ldog pa med par lan btab pa bkag pa yin nam ;
T03TD3803E:49a-26: brtags par rab tu snang bas ni de nye bar mi 'gro ba gang las yin zhe na //
T03TD3803E:49a-27: de nas tshig drug gis ni brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa na skye ba yin la /
T03TD3803E:49a-28: mi rten pa dang mngon par zhen pa med pa de'i tshe ni ldog par 'dod do //
T03TD3803E:49a-29: sngon skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:49b-0: snga ma ni rang @49b gi ngang gis 'jig pa'i phyir de ltar na de dag ni skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa de'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03TD3803E:49b-1: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas pa yin no snyam pa 'di /
T03TD3803E:49b-2: thams cad sems la bzhag nas dri ba ni /
T03TD3803E:49b-3: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba smos so //
T03TD3803E:49b-4: lan ni 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
T03TD3803E:49b-5: gang gzugs la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:49b-6: 'jig pa med pa de dag ni de'i dngos po med pa dag ste /
T03TD3803E:49b-7: dngos po med pa yang skye ba dang /
T03TD3803E:49b-8: 'jig pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:49b-10: gang yang dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo gzhan dbang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni dngos po med pa gnyis med na ni 'byung ba'i don gyis te /
T03TD3803E:49b-11: de las gcig tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:49b-12: de ltar na tha mi dad pa bkag nas tha dad pa yang dag par smras pa /
T03TD3803E:49b-13: de ni skye ba med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:49b-15: gzugs la sogs pas 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:49b-16: gzugs la sogs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe gnyis su bgyir ma mchis zhes bya ba mi rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3803E:49b-17: 'dir de'i phyir gang yang 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di smras so //
T03TD3803E:49b-18: gzhan gyi dbang ni gzugs la sogs pa mi bzung ste /
T03TD3803E:49b-20: gang gnyis su med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba yongs su grub bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:49b-21: gang gi phyir yongs su grub pa ni chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo brtags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T03TD3803E:49b-23: 'jig pa yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3803E:49b-24: des na gsum po 'di dag ni gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo yin zhes bsams te de ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:49b-25: da ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dbang du byas nas brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:49b-26: de la dang po chos bzhi nye bar dri bar bya ste byang chub sems dpa' gang yin /
T03TD3803E:49b-27: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin /
T03TD3803E:49b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin /
T03TD3803E:49b-29: nye bar yongs su rtog pa gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:50a-0: de la byang chub nyid sems dpa' ste des na byang chub sems @50a * //
T03TD3803E:50a-2: / des chos thams cad rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad kyi ye shes te mngon par zhen pa med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:50a-3: rnam par rtog pa las srung bar byed pas nad pa ste /
T03TD3803E:50a-4: rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i chos rnams so//
T03TD3803E:50a-5: rnam par rtog pa dag las chags pa med pa ni aa par mi ta ste /
T03TD3803E:50a-7: de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don te /
T03TD3803E:50a-8: 'dir shes rab kyang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:50a-9: gang chos thams cad rtag pa dang bde ba dang /
T03TD3803E:50a-11: bdag dang spong ma ma yin pa dang /
T03TD3803E:50a-15: so sor yang de las bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bzlog cing bkag pas nye bar rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:50a-16: de la 'dir nye bar brtag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag las gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:50a-17: de'i 'og tu nye bar brtag pa gzhan yang de dag las gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:50a-18: de nyid 'di las bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3803E:50a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
T03TD3803E:50a-20: don ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:50a-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T03TD3803E:50a-22: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'di gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa ste /
T03TD3803E:50a-23: gnyis su med pa yang chos kyi dbyings yin te /
T03TD3803E:50a-24: rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:50a-25: skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:50a-26: gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo ni 'dir ma grub ste /
T03TD3803E:50a-27: de ni don dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
T03TD3803E:50a-28: 'di ni don dam pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:50a-29: gal te 'dir nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T03TD3803E:50a-30: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03TD3803E:50a-31: dka' ba'i las la spyod pa ni spyod pa'o //
T03TD3803E:50a-32: de ci'i phyir spyod ce na sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
T03TD3803E:50a-34: sems can rnams kyi phyir lag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:50b-0: mgo dang lus sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi @50b don gyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:50b-1: de dag so sor myong bar bya ba'i phyir du ci'i phyir spro bar byed ce na /
T03TD3803E:50b-2: go cha'i brtson 'grus kyis sbyor bar byed pa yin te des na dka' ba'i spyod pa mi byed pa ste /
T03TD3803E:50b-3: de la brtson pa ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:50b-4: de'i rgyu gzhan dbang nyid kyis don dam pa ma yin pa'i phyir la /
T03TD3803E:50b-5: don dam pa ma yin pa la ni goms par mi byed cing khyad par du yang dka' ba spyod par mi byed ces rgol ba la /
T03TD3803E:50b-6: de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rab 'byor gyi lan no //
T03TD3803E:50b-7: de la dang po'i tshig gis ni khas mi len pa dang /
T03TD3803E:50b-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
T03TD3803E:50b-9: gang dka' ba spyod par 'dod pa de ni de la mi 'dod pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur na /
T03TD3803E:50b-10: bdag mi 'dod de gang las mi 'dod par byed ce na /
T03TD3803E:50b-11: dka' ba'i 'du shes kyi dka' ba spyod na ni yid la gcags par 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:50b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:50b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa'i lan yin te /
T03TD3803E:50b-14: mi spyod ces bya ba ni spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3803E:50b-15: zin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:50b-16: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis pa'i lan no /
T03TD3803E:50b-17: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa'i lan no //
T03TD3803E:50b-18: ci nas kyang bdag thams cad kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal thams cad las zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po thams cad las so //
T03TD3803E:50b-19: de dag thams cad la yongs su thar par bya'o ;
T03TD3803E:50b-20: / thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni khams dang 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3803E:50b-21: skye gnas kyi bye brag thams cad nas so //
T03TD3803E:50b-22: thams cad ces bya ba ni thams cad ji lta ba'i sdug bsngal gsum las so //
T03TD3803E:50b-23: rnam pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rtsol ba thams cad las so //
T03TD3803E:50b-24: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa mtha' dag las thar par bya ba'o //
T03TD3803E:50b-25: sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:50b-26: gnod sems ni khong khro ba'o //
T03TD3803E:50b-27: ji ltar bdag med ce na thams cad nas zhes bya ba ni bdag dang /
T03TD3803E:51a-1: pa'i dbye ba thams cad nas so //
T03TD3803E:51a-2: yang thams cad ces bya ba ni ji ltar mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i bye brag gis yod pa'o //
T03TD3803E:51a-3: rnam pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i dbye ba'am dbye ba ma yin bas so /
T03TD3803E:51a-4: ji ltar dbye ba ma yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:51a-5: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni /
T03TD3803E:51a-6: ji ltar yod pa'i sde tshan bsdus pa'am /
T03TD3803E:51a-8: ji ltar bdag de ltar chos thams cad med pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:51a-9: yang thams cad zhes bya ba ni phung po dang /
T03TD3803E:51a-10: khams la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi dbye ba thams cad do //
T03TD3803E:51a-11: thams cad ni ji ltar yod pa'i sde tshan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i yan lag gi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:51a-12: rnam pa thams cad ji ltar yod pa'i sde tshan so so de dag thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:51a-13: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi bye brag gis bdag dang gzhan dag la bsdus pa'am tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:51a-14: de bas na de ltar dka' ba spyod pa med par thal bar 'gyur la lan bzhi smras pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:51a-15: lan bzhi pa la 'di ltar yang bstan pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:51a-16: dka' ba spyod pa yang skye ba med pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mthong nas /
T03TD3803E:51a-18: gang gi phyir de nus pa dang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:51a-19: skye ba med pa la ni sdug bsngal thams cad snang ba med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:51a-21: rnam pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa bkag pas so //
T03TD3803E:51a-22: tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus gang yang zhes bya ba nas btsams nas /
T03TD3803E:51a-23: de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan to //
T03TD3803E:51a-24: 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T03TD3803E:51a-25: sangs rgyas dang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:51a-26: de nas thob pa'i rnam par rtog pa dgag pa'i phyir de skad ces smras pa dang /
T03TD3803E:51a-27: zhes bya ba nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du so sor snang ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du smras so //
T03TD3803E:51a-28: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo //
T03TD3803E:51a-29: rjes su thob pa nyid ces bya ba ni dang po nyid nas chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi phyir te /
T03TD3803E:51b-0: chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par @51b dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams so //
T03TD3803E:51b-1: de skad ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rab 'byor gyi lan ni //
T03TD3803E:51b-2: skye ba med pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings so //
T03TD3803E:51b-3: thob par byed ces bya ba ni thob par ro //
T03TD3803E:51b-4: kho bo me 'dod do zhes bya ba ni rtog ba med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:51b-5: gal te thob bar 'dod na ni de'i tshe kho bo skye bar 'dod pa yin te thob par 'gyur na de ni mi 'dod de /
T03TD3803E:51b-6: rigs pa med pas thob par thal bar 'gyur ro //
T03TD3803E:51b-7: rigs pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
T03TD3803E:51b-8: chos thams cad nyid la skye ba med pa dang zhes bya ba phyogs la ni thal ba 'di yin te /
T03TD3803E:51b-9: de la skye ba med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o //
T03TD3803E:51b-10: gnyis ka yang thog ma med pa nas thob ba med pa'i phyir ro //
