T03TD3803E:197a-26: de yang rang bzhin gyis ma dag pa'am /
T03TD3803E:197a-27: dag pa cig yin grang na /
T03TD3803E:197b-0: phyogs dang po ltar na de ni dag pa ma @197b yin te /
T03TD3803E:197b-1: sol ba bdar ba bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:197b-2: phyogs gnyis pa ltar na don med do //
T03TD3803E:197b-3: ji ste sems kyi chos nyid dag pa yin no zhe na /
T03TD3803E:197b-4: de yang mi rigs te de la ni rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
T03TD3803E:197b-5: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:197b-6: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa de'i phyir dgongs pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rjes su rig par bya /
T03TD3803E:197b-8: de ni rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir de yang mi rigs so zhes smras pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3803E:197b-9: 'di ni smras kyang 'on kyang mi rigs te /
T03TD3803E:197b-10: gtan tshigs nges pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:197b-11: de ni rang bzhin kho nas rnam par dag kyang /
T03TD3803E:197b-12: de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir glo bur gyi sgrib pa'i dri mas dri ma can du byas pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:197b-15: khug rna la sogs pas bsgribs pas nam mkha' bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:197b-16: phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de dag bsal bas rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ sprin la sogs pa bsal ba'i nam mkha' bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:197b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan la /
T03TD3803E:197b-18: bstan pas mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes pa skyed par byed do //
T03TD3803E:197b-19: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
T03TD3803E:197b-20: chos thams cad tshig med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lan gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:197b-21: chos thams cad ni tshig med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:197b-22: tshig gis rang gi ngo bo mi ston te /
T03TD3803E:197b-23: mtshon pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T03TD3803E:197b-24: des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don dam pa ston pa'i don du rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:197b-25: gal te las zad cing nyon mongs pa zad kyang /
T03TD3803E:197b-27: ji ste zad pas skye ba yang zad de /
T03TD3803E:197b-28: de 'du byed lhag ma tshe ji srid kyi bar du gnas nas rang nyid 'gag par 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:197b-29: des na byang chub kho nar 'gyur gyi /
T03TD3803E:197b-30: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:198a-0: de'i khyad par ni brjod par bya ba ma yin nam zhe na zhes bya ba @198a * //
T03TD3803E:198a-2: tshig gsum gyis ni lan gsungs te //
T03TD3803E:198a-3: chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zad pa med pa'i chos rnams mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:198a-4: ji ltar 'gog pa med ce na /
T03TD3803E:198a-5: spang ba dang mnyam pa ni nges pa med pas spang ba dang /
T03TD3803E:198a-6: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:198a-7: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:198a-8: ji ltar de dag gi de bzhin nyid de kho na bzhin du shes pa ni de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'o //
T03TD3803E:198a-9: de ltar de dag de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:198a-10: chos thams cad mi 'ong zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:198a-11: mi 'ong zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas so //
T03TD3803E:198a-12: mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i dus su'o //
T03TD3803E:198a-13: gang nas 'ong bar bya ba dang /
T03TD3803E:198a-14: gang du 'gro bar bya ba de dag med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:198a-15: gang yang mi shes pa ni rang rig pa tsam gyis dus mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:198a-16: mi shes pa'i phyir dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:198a-17: de bas na mi skye shin tu mi skye zhes bya ba yin no //
T03TD3803E:198a-18: 'di tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T03TD3803E:198a-19: 'di rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa yin na yang /
T03TD3803E:198a-20: 'jig rten na rang gi don la rang bzhin gyis dga' ba'i phyir de'i don du dka' ba yang 'bad par byed do //
T03TD3803E:198a-21: gzhan gyi don ni dka' ste /
T03TD3803E:198a-22: sems can rnams mtha' yas pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:198a-23: gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:198a-24: log par rtog pa mang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'o //
T03TD3803E:198a-25: bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir zhes bya ba lan gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:198a-26: bdag dang gzhan zhes bya ba ni dbye ba'o //
T03TD3803E:198a-27: de mi mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad dang bdag mnyam pa nyid du lta'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:198a-28: de ltar yang 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las /
T03TD3803E:198a-29: 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri rab dang mnyam pa bskyed kyang /
T03TD3803E:198b-0: byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing de las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye'o zhes @198b gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3803E:198b-1: de'i 'og tu dka' ba'i 'du shes kyi gnyen po de lta ji ltar so sor brtag par bya ba de ni chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3803E:198b-2: khong khro ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:198b-3: de la dang po sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la sogs par dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:198b-4: chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:198b-5: chos thams cad ni sems can tha snyad du gdags pa'i yul te /
T03TD3803E:198b-7: gang gi phyir rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:198b-8: khur mi khyer ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir khur mi khyer ba'o //
T03TD3803E:198b-9: sems can gdul bar bya ba'i don du phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba na /
T03TD3803E:198b-10: dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:198b-11: chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:198b-14: rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de ni de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid de /
T03TD3803E:198b-15: de ni yul na med de /
T03TD3803E:198b-16: gnas pa med pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:198b-18: cha med pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:198b-19: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bar dka' ba'i 'du shes bsal ba'i phyir gsungs pa ni 'khor ba'i chos thams cad 'gag pa na rab tu sim par byed pa nyid kyis bde ba'i 'du shes skyed pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:198b-20: de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:198b-21: kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag //
T03TD3803E:198b-22: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin //
T03TD3803E:198b-24: de dag myur du zhi ba bde //
T03TD3803E:198b-26: 'o zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba rdzogs pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:198b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:199a-0: dga' ba med cing dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'i phyir @199a * //
T03TD3803E:199a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:199a-2: dga' ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la shin tu dga' ba'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-3: dga' ba dang bral ba ni shin tu 'khor ba la skyo ba'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-4: de med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-5: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa ste /
T03TD3803E:199a-7: mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i so sor rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-8: 'dod chags med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la so sor rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-9: chos thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mngon par ma zhen pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-10: chags pa dang ma chags pa dang /
T03TD3803E:199a-11: de'i gnyen po de dang bral ba dang /
T03TD3803E:199a-12: gsum mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par rtog pa spang ba la so sor rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-13: chos thams cad ni lam thams cad de /
T03TD3803E:199a-14: mngon par rtogs pa bdun no //
T03TD3803E:199a-16: byang chub thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:199a-17: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pa zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:199a-18: khong du chud pa ni thob pa ste /
T03TD3803E:199a-20: legs par rtogs pa thob pa la so sor rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-21: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad de /
T03TD3803E:199a-22: de ni stong pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:199a-23: mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ste /
T03TD3803E:199a-24: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid kyi don dang bral ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:199a-25: mtshan ma thams cad nub pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:199a-26: 'khrul pa'i ngo bo'i khams gsum pa la smon pa med pa nyid kyi phyir te go rims bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:199a-27: 'di ni lam la so sor rtog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-28: gal te de dag rnam par thar ba'i sgo'i lam la'ang sgom pa de'i tshe 'ang dman pa'i byang chub tu ltung bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03TD3803E:199a-29: de'i phyir byams pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:199a-30: chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad do //
T03TD3803E:199a-31: sman zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la dga' ba'i nad chen po sel ba'o //
T03TD3803E:199a-33: byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:199b-0: gang gi phyir byams pa chen po ni de dag gi sngon du @199b 'gro ba'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-1: gzhan yang de dag tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3803E:199b-2: lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la sogs pa la gnas pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-3: tshangs pa lta bur gyur ba zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-4: de bzhin du zhe sdang mi len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-5: zhe sdang thams cad mi len pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-6: zhe sdang thams cad byams pa la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
T03TD3803E:199b-7: go rims bzhin du gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang /
T03TD3803E:199b-11: smon pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:199b-12: khong khro ba med pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:199b-13: 'di ni mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bcu gsum phan yon dang bcas pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-14: skad cig ma'i gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs par brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:199b-15: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03TD3803E:199b-16: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03TD3803E:199b-17: zhes bya ba la chos thams cad zag pa med pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:199b-18: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:199b-19: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:199b-20: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:199b-21: chos thams cad gnyis su med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:199b-22: de la dang po'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:199b-23: sbyin la sogs pa re res kyang //
T03TD3803E:199b-24: zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir //
T03TD3803E:199b-25: thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yi //
T03TD3803E:199b-26: rtogs par 'di ni shes par bya //
T03TD3803E:199b-27: ji ltar skyes bus zo chun rgyud //
T03TD3803E:199b-28: rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na //
T03TD3803E:199b-29: thams cad cig car 'gul ba ltar //
T03TD3803E:199b-30: skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:199b-32: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni //
T03TD3803E:200a-0: sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis @200a * //
T03TD3803E:200a-1: 'jug pa na sbyin pa la sogs pa re res kyang /
T03TD3803E:200a-2: zag pa med pa'i chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3803E:200a-4: skad cig ma gcig pa'i rtogs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:200a-5: sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:200a-6: 'di ni zhes bya ba dang po'o //
T03TD3803E:200a-7: de ltar na ji ltar skyes bus rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na /
T03TD3803E:200a-8: zo chun gyi rgyud thams cad cig car 'gul ba de bzhin du /
T03TD3803E:200a-9: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni /
T03TD3803E:200a-10: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs cig car 'dren par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:200a-12: rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:200a-13: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:200a-14: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang /
T03TD3803E:200a-15: ma bral ba'i phyir zab cing rgya che ba ste /
T03TD3803E:200a-16: sbyin pa la sogs pa re re'i sems kyi skad cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do //
T03TD3803E:200a-17: de'i mu med pa ni mu med pa ste /
T03TD3803E:200a-18: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams 'dren pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:200a-19: de dag phan tshun 'brel pa ni yin ring du yongs su 'dren pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:200a-20: de rjes su rig par bya ba ni shes par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:200a-22: rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:200a-23: zab cing rgya che ba'i rgya mtsho ni mu med de /
T03TD3803E:200a-24: mu med pa ni cig car chu bo'i chu 'dren pa de nyid de /
T03TD3803E:200a-25: de dag phan tshun 'dren pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:200a-26: rgya mtsho mu med pa'i dpe des de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:200a-27: 'di ni zag pa med pa'i chos sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste dang po'i //
T03TD3803E:200a-28: gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:200a-29: gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi /
T03TD3803E:200a-30: rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin //
T03TD3803E:200a-31: rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes /
T03TD3803E:200a-32: de yi skad cig gcig ye shes //
T03TD3803E:200a-34: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos ni rnam smin gyi chos so //
T03TD3803E:200a-35: de'i dngos po ni de nyid do //
T03TD3803E:200b-0: de'i gnas skabs 'del yod pa de la @200b de skad ces bya ste /
T03TD3803E:200b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-2: chos dkar thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang //
T03TD3803E:200b-3: gang dag zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:200b-4: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad 'dis sngon ngo bo nyid med par bsgoms pas /
T03TD3803E:200b-5: de dag kyang phyis rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-6: des na rang bzhin nyid kyis de dag ngo bo nyid med par yang dag par rig ste /
T03TD3803E:200b-7: de'i phyir dkar po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:200b-8: 'di lta bu de gang gi tshe skyes pa ni phun gsum tshogs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:200b-9: de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis de dag thams cad la lhun gyis grub par shes so //
T03TD3803E:200b-10: zag pa med pa thams cad la 'bad pa dang bcas pa 'di ni dang po'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-11: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:200b-12: zag pa med pa la lhun gyis grub pa ni gnyis pa ste /
T03TD3803E:200b-14: nam mkha' mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:200b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par smin pa'i chos nyid kyi gnas skabs dang /
T03TD3803E:200b-16: dkar po'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:200b-17: de nyid kyi phyir mu med pa ni de dag thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid med par ro gcig pa'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-18: lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T03TD3803E:200b-19: de'i mu med pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-21: nam mkha' mu med pa nyid kyi dpes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:200b-22: nam mkha' ni nam mkha' ste /
T03TD3803E:200b-23: de'i gzugs kyi rdzas kyi dngos po med par gcig pa'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-24: mu med pa ni lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T03TD3803E:200b-26: de'i phyir gnyi ga mu med pa ji lta bu 'di ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dkar po'i chos thams cad sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:200b-27: gsungs pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:200b-28: sbyin la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis //
T03TD3803E:200b-29: chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas //
T03TD3803E:200b-30: chas rnams mtshan nyid med pa nyid //
T03TD3803E:200b-31: skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs //
T03TD3803E:200b-33: rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba nas /
T03TD3803E:200b-34: dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i bar ni yum chen mo /
T03TD3803E:201a-2: tshig gcig smos pa ni thams cad gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:201a-3: de yang don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
T03TD3803E:201a-4: 'di dag so sor snang ba ni ji lta bu'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-5: des na sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa la gnas nas /
T03TD3803E:201a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
T03TD3803E:201a-7: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs shing shes te /
T03TD3803E:201a-8: khams kyi don ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyis na rtogs pa'i don ni shes pa la 'jug go //
T03TD3803E:201a-9: 'di ltar ri rab sna tshogs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:201a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid du rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-11: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par gang ro gcig par shes pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-12: de'i phyir ro gcig pa yin yang gang chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba 'di ni ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid kyi dpes rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-13: ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin yang /
T03TD3803E:201a-14: ri rab kyi rnam pa sna tshogs su bstan te /
T03TD3803E:201a-15: ri rab kyi logs bzhi'i kha dog gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra ba'i kha dog tu snang ste /
T03TD3803E:201a-17: chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par sems kyi skad cig gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-18: bzhi pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:201a-20: rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid //
T03TD3803E:201a-21: gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar //
T03TD3803E:201a-22: chos rnams gnyis su med pa yi //
T03TD3803E:201a-23: de nyid skad cig gcig gis mthong //
T03TD3803E:201a-25: gsum pa la ni chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par so sor snang ba'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-26: bzhi pa la ni de dag nub pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:201a-27: ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bslad pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T03TD3803E:201a-28: de la rmi lam du mthong ba ni mi dang glang po dang /
T03TD3803E:201a-31: de mthong ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T03TD3803E:201a-32: de dag nub pa'i phyir gang de dag mi mthong ba ni gnyis kyi tshul du tha dad pa med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201b-0: de ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis @201b med pa'i stong pa ste /
T03TD3803E:201b-1: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid don dam pa skad cig ma gcig gis mthong ba'o //
T03TD3803E:201b-2: de nyid gzugs mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:201b-3: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201b-4: de'i mu med pa nyid ni chos thams cad don dam pa dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' kho na ltar des yang dag par rig pas na /
T03TD3803E:201b-7: gzugs la sogs pa mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:201b-8: ji ltar de dag mu med pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:201b-9: gnyis su snang ba nub pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3803E:201b-10: ji srid du 'di mu yod pa de srid du ni gzhan gyi mtshan ma nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:201b-11: gzugs dang de'i 'dzin pa dag nub kyang mu med pa ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:201b-13: gzugs nyid ces gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3803E:201b-14: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gsungs pas so //
T03TD3803E:201b-15: de lta mod kyi 'dzin pa zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3803E:201b-16: ma yin te der yang phung po nyid bsdus pa'i phyir te /
T03TD3803E:201b-17: snang ba med par 'dzin pa'i bdag mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:201b-18: chos thams cad gnyis su med par sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201b-19: skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa ste bdun pa'o //
T03TD3803E:201b-20: mngon par rtogs pa brgyad pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T03TD3803E:201b-21: de'i dngos po yang bzhi ste /
T03TD3803E:201b-24: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03TD3803E:201b-25: de bzhin gzhan ni sprul ba dang //
T03TD3803E:201b-26: chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste //
T03TD3803E:201b-27: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03TD3803E:201b-30: de yang 'dir khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:201b-31: skabs kyi mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3803E:201b-32: de na chos kyis thob pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku ste /
T03TD3803E:201b-34: sangs rgyas rnams kyi lus gsum ni sku gsum mo //
T03TD3803E:201b-35: bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo las rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa /
T03TD3803E:201b-36: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
T03TD3803E:202a-1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:202a-2: gzhan yang chos de dag nyid rtogs pas /
T03TD3803E:202a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:202a-4: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T03TD3803E:202a-5: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sku /
T03TD3803E:202a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa'i mchog gi chos bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T03TD3803E:202a-8: rab tu dga' ba'i bde ba la longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to //
T03TD3803E:202a-9: gzhan yang chos de dag nyid rtogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
T03TD3803E:202a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dus thams cad du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:202a-12: sku gsum dag gis sangs rgyas kyi //
T03TD3803E:202a-13: sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste //
T03TD3803E:202a-14: sku gsung dag gis rang gzhan gyi //
T03TD3803E:202a-15: don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan //
T03TD3803E:202a-17: de bas na sku gsum dang /
T03TD3803E:202a-18: mdzad pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ni chos kyi sku bstan te /
T03TD3803E:202a-19: de la ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid kho na ngo bo nyid do //
T03TD3803E:202a-20: yang na de nyid la ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba'i rnam par dag pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T03TD3803E:202a-21: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i don du 'gyur ba yin pas /
T03TD3803E:202a-24: der grub pa'i sku ni sprul pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:202a-25: de la ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:202a-27: thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni //
T03TD3803E:202a-28: zag pa med pa'i chos skun du //
T03TD3803E:202a-29: rnam par dag gyur gang dag yin //
T03TD3803E:202a-30: de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can //
T03TD3803E:202a-32: de dag gi rang bzhin ni chos nyid de /
T03TD3803E:202a-34: chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:202a-35: shin tu thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:202a-36: 'on kyang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:202b-0: @202b de ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das sangs rgyas kyis ni rnam pa lngas bsdus te /
T03TD3803E:202b-2: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:202b-3: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3803E:202b-4: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T03TD3803E:202b-5: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T03TD3803E:202b-6: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes yin no zhes gsungs so zhe na /
T03TD3803E:202b-7: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa ste /
T03TD3803E:202b-8: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:202b-9: chos nyid tha dad pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:202b-10: de'i phyir mdo las nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:202b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
T03TD3803E:202b-12: skrag pa nyid la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs pa ni shel dag pa lta bu'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-14: nyi ma dag las gzhan pa ni nyan thos dang /
T03TD3803E:202b-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i dpe'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-17: nyi ma shel sgong dag pa lta bu de dag pas 'di lhag pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:202b-18: gang gi phyir phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba spros pa des shes bya'i yul mtha' yas pa dag la shes pa mtha' yas pa skyed pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i dpe'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-19: de nyid kyi phyir de ni chos kyi sku zhes kyang brjod de /
T03TD3803E:202b-20: gang gi phyir chos mtha' yas pa brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:202b-21: de ni 'dir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa las skyes ba'i ye shes mtha' yas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-22: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dpes de ni shes bya mu med pa la snang bar rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-23: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi dag pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T03TD3803E:202b-25: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:202b-26: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-27: gang des mu med par snang ba de la 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba dang 'dra'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-28: de la 'dis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T03TD3803E:202b-29: de yang shes bya thams cad la shes pa dbang du bya ba dang /
T03TD3803E:203a-0: de nyid sems can gyi don dbang du byed pa @203a * //
T03TD3803E:203a-3: rtag pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:203a-5: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas //
T03TD3803E:203a-6: gang dang gang la gang dang ni //
T03TD3803E:203a-7: gang tshe bya ba phan 'gyur ba //
T03TD3803E:203a-8: de dang de la de snang de //
T03TD3803E:203a-9: lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang //
T03TD3803E:203a-10: sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar //
T03TD3803E:203a-11: sangs rgyas rnams ni byon gyur kyang //
T03TD3803E:203a-12: skal ba med pas bzang mi myong //
T03TD3803E:203a-13: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
T03TD3803E:203a-14: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03TD3803E:203a-15: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
T03TD3803E:203a-16: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03TD3803E:203a-18: de zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-19: snang ngo zhes bya ba ni sprul pa ste bsod nams las so //
T03TD3803E:203a-20: gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni de dang de dag ces bya bar rtogs par bya ba'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-21: de dang de zhes bya bas ni phan par byed pa zhes don gyis rtogs par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-22: ci'i phyir de dang de la zhes gsungs she na /
T03TD3803E:203a-23: lha'i rgyal pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:203a-24: mdzad pa rgya che ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa thams cad la mdzad pa'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-25: de nyid kyi mdzad pa ste /
T03TD3803E:203a-27: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la ni brjod par bya ba mang du yod de de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:203a-28: sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:203a-30: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mnyan te /
T03TD3803E:203a-31: theg pa mchog gi chos yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-32: de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:203a-33: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:203a-34: gang yang mkhas pa rnams kyi yid bde ba'i mtshan nyid chung du dang /
T03TD3803E:203a-39: rab tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa de ni dngos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-40: de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-42: sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:203a-43: gang gi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa de gnyis dang go rims bzhin du mu med par ston pa'i sgra dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-1: skyed par byed par sbyar ro //
T03TD3803E:203b-2: thams cad ces ci'i phyir smes she na gdul bya rnams sna tshogs pa thams cad la snang ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:203b-3: ji ltar mu med pa yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:203b-4: mtha' ma med par sku des ston pa la dus tshad med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:203b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub kyang mu med pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:203b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:203b-8: ji skad du ston pa nyid kyis theg pa chen po'i mchog yang dag par rtags pa ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:203b-9: de'i mu med pa ni de'i rgyu ste /
T03TD3803E:203b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:203b-11: chos de yang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo las gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:203b-12: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-13: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-14: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-15: zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-16: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-17: nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-19: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-20: rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-22: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-23: bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-24: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-25: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-26: bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-28: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
T03TD3803E:203b-29: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:203b-31: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-32: rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni //
T03TD3803E:203b-33: snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-34: zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-35: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni //
T03TD3803E:203b-36: rab tu dbye ba rnam brgyad dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-37: nyon mongs med par smon mkhyen dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-38: mngon shes so sor yang dag rig //
T03TD3803E:203b-39: rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-40: dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang //
T03TD3803E:203b-41: mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-2: dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-3: bsnyel ba mi mnga' chos nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-4: bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-5: skye la thugs rje chen po dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-6: thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos //
T03TD3803E:204a-7: bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:204a-9: chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin //
T03TD3803E:204a-11: byang chub kyi phyogs dang tshad med pa zhes zlas dbye bar bya'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-12: mthar gyis zhes bya ba ni 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-13: bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba ma yin pa las bsrung ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:204a-14: bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don te rnam pa gsum mo //
T03TD3803E:204a-15: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i chos kyi tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:204a-16: skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gis mang du bshad de lhag ma yang bdag gis bshad par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-17: rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba ni gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni kha dog bzang ba dang /
T03TD3803E:204a-22: dkar po ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-23: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni snga ma bzhin te 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-24: sdug pa'i rnam par thar ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-25: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T03TD3803E:204a-27: tshor ba 'gog pa zhes bya ba dang brgyad de /
T03TD3803E:204a-28: 'di dag gis sgrib pa las rnam par grol bas na rnam par thar pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-29: de la gsum ni mya ngan las 'das pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-30: lhag ma ni zhi bar gnas pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-31: yang gsum ni gzugs can no //
T03TD3803E:204a-32: lnga ni gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-33: brgyad pa ni sgrib pa rab tu zhi pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-34: gzugs can ni bdag la gzugs su 'du shes pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-35: lta ba ni yid kyis mos shing sprul nas lta ba'o //
T03TD3803E:204a-36: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sdug pa dang /
T03TD3803E:204a-37: mi sdug pa'i gzugs de dag sprul nas mi byed pa'i 'du shes thob pas go rims bzhin du mthun pa dang /
T03TD3803E:204b-0: mi @204b mthun pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:204b-2: tshor ba 'gog pa ni brgyad pa ste /
T03TD3803E:204b-3: sems dang sems las 'byung ba nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyis bsdus pa sngar kun nas ldang ba las de 'gog pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-4: dmigs pa'i sgom pa zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched sems la gnas pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de /
T03TD3803E:204b-6: de la dang po'i rnam par thar pa las ni gnyis sgrub po //
T03TD3803E:204b-7: gnyis pa las kyang gnyis so //
T03TD3803E:204b-9: nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu la kha dog ngan pa dang /
T03TD3803E:204b-13: gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes shing /
T03TD3803E:204b-14: de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni dang po'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-15: nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen po la kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan par lta zhing de bzhin du shes par 'gyur pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-16: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu la sogs par lta ba ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-17: nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la chen po la sogs par lta bu ni bzhi pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-18: rnam par thar pa gsum pa las ni bzhi mngon par sgrub po //
T03TD3803E:204b-19: nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba ni sngon po //
T03TD3803E:204b-23: dper na zar ma'i me tog gam //
T03TD3803E:204b-24: yul b'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po //
T03TD3803E:204b-27: sngon por snang ba de bzhin du /
T03TD3803E:204b-28: gzugs de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas /
T03TD3803E:204b-29: de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur zhing lta ba 'di ni lnga pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-30: de bzhin du ser po la sogs pa ni dper na dong ka'i mi tog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni drug pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-31: de bzhin du dmar po la sogs pa ni dper na pan du dzi ba ka'i me tog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bdun pa'o //
T03TD3803E:204b-32: de bzhin du dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T03TD3803E:204b-33: dper na skar ma pa ba sangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgyad pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-1: du zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi grangs su ston pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:205a-2: tshad chung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:205a-4: ngan pa ni sdug ba dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-5: mi sdug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:205a-7: gya nom pa ni lha la yod pa dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-9: rnam par thar pa de dag la mos par byas nas /
T03TD3803E:205a-10: zil gyis mnan pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis gnon par byed do //
T03TD3803E:205a-11: yang dang yang du mi mthong zhing mi snang bar byas pa'i phyir zil gyis gnon pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-12: shes pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
T03TD3803E:205a-13: mthong ba ni lhag mthong gis so //
T03TD3803E:205a-14: de ltar 'du shes par 'gyur ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:205a-15: chen po ni sems can ma yin par ston pa ste /
T03TD3803E:205a-16: de dag ni khyim dang gzhal med khang dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-18: tshad chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:205a-19: sngon po zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-21: kha dog sngon po zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i kha dog go //
T03TD3803E:205a-22: sngon por ston pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i kha dog go //
T03TD3803E:205a-23: sngon por snang ba ni gnyi ga'i kha dog tu snang ba'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-24: aom ma ka ni zar ma'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-25: kar ma ka ni dong ka'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-26: ban du dzi ba ka ni pan du ka'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-27: pa ba sangs ni thor sa shar ba'i skar ma'o //
T03TD3803E:205a-28: zad par bcu'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
T03TD3803E:205a-29: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis mnan nas /
T03TD3803E:205a-30: sa la sogs pa thams cad kun du khyab bar byas pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ces brjod do //
T03TD3803E:205a-31: kha cig ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de ni zad par gyi skye mched du brjod do //
T03TD3803E:205a-32: kha cig ni sa la sogs pa dag gis khyad par du ston te /
T03TD3803E:205a-41: zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-42: zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do //
T03TD3803E:205a-43: rnam pa thams cad dag pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni rten yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-44: dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-45: thugs yongs su dag pa dang /
T03TD3803E:205a-46: ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-0: de la bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i @205b phyogs rnams kyi gnas ngan len rten las gtan du bral zhing rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang /
T03TD3803E:205b-1: gnag du gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho la dbang bsgyur ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i rten yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-4: dmigs pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du dbang bsgyur ba ni dmigs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-5: snga ma bzhin du sems kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas /
T03TD3803E:205b-6: sems la rnam pa thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba ni /
T03TD3803E:205b-7: rnam pa thams cad du thugs yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-8: snga ma bzhin du ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral pas shes pa dang shes bya thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyi ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-9: dbang bcu ni bcu la dbang ba ste /
T03TD3803E:205b-10: tshe la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par tshe la gnas pa dang spang ba la'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-11: sems la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:205b-12: yo byad la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod bar 'tshog chas nye bar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:205b-13: las la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par lus dang ngag gi las grub pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-14: skye ba la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa rnams su skye par byed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-15: rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-16: smon lam la dbang ba ni smon lam thams cad yang dag par 'byor pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-17: mos pa la dbang ba ni gang ji ltar mos pa de bzhin du 'gyur ba'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-18: ye shes la dbang ba ni gang kho na shes par 'dod pa de nyid shes pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-19: chos la dbang ba ni mdo la sogs pa chos rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-20: bsrung ba med pa gsum na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
T03TD3803E:205b-21: de la yongs su ma dag pa ni sku'i spyod pa mi mnga' bas /
T03TD3803E:205b-22: gzhan la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes bcas pa'i dgongs pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-23: de bzhin du gsung gi phrin las ni gnyis pa'o //
T03TD3803E:205b-24: de bzhin du thugs kyi phrin las ni gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:206a-0: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum ni ji ltar @206a * //
T03TD3803E:206a-1: mdo las gsungs pa bzhin te /
T03TD3803E:206a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa na /
T03TD3803E:206a-3: gcig tu gus par nyan cing brtun te /
T03TD3803E:206a-4: bka' sems la nye bar 'jog cing /
T03TD3803E:206a-5: chos kyi rjes su chos nye bar sgrub pa na /
T03TD3803E:206a-6: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur thugs yeng yeng por mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3803E:206a-7: gzhan dag gus par mi nyen cing /
T03TD3803E:206a-8: rna ba'i 'dud pa la sogs pa la des de bzhin gshegs pa thugs khong khro bar mi 'gyur /
T03TD3803E:206a-10: thugs mi mnyes par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T03TD3803E:206a-11: gcig tu gus par nyan pa dang gcig tu gus par mi nyan pa de dag la des de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dgyes pa'am /
T03TD3803E:206a-12: khong khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur bar thams cad du dran pa dang /
T03TD3803E:206a-13: shes bzhin du ldan pas btang snyoms su bzhugs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:206a-14: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems can gyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste /
T03TD3803E:206a-15: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bya ba'i mdzad pa gzhan mi mnga' bar rig pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:206a-16: bag chags yang dag par bcom pa ni gang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang ma spangs pa ltar spyod pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags so //
T03TD3803E:206a-17: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste /
T03TD3803E:206a-18: de bas na bcom ldan 'das ni bag chags yang dag par bcom pa zhes bya'o //
T03TD3803E:206a-19: thugs rje chen po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dus thams cad du phan pa'i dgongs pas 'jig rten la lan drug tu gzigs pa ste su ni nyams /
T03TD3803E:206a-20: su ni 'phel zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:206a-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:206a-22: khyad par gyi dbye ba mtha' yas pa mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:206a-23: nyon mongs pa ni 'thab pa dang /
T03TD3803E:206a-25: 'dir ni rtsod pa'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa la nyon mongs pa 'di dag gis bdag la dmigs nas nyon mongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar /
T03TD3803E:206a-26: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste /
T03TD3803E:206a-27: gang gi phyir gzhan dag gi grong la sogs par 'jug pa na bdag la dmigs nas de dag gi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba ni nyan thos la yang yod /
T03TD3803E:206b-1: de ni thun mong yin no //
T03TD3803E:206b-2: de dag gi mdzad pa'i khyad par de'i ting nge 'dzin de dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:206b-4: nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lha //
T03TD3803E:206b-5: mi yi nyon mongs spong nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:206b-6: rgyal ba'i grong sogs de dag gi //
T03TD3803E:206b-7: nyon mongs rgyun gcod nyon mongs med //
T03TD3803E:206b-9: nyan thos kyi nyon mongs pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mthong ba spong bar byed de /
T03TD3803E:206b-10: nyon mongs pa mngon sum du spong ba ni ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:206b-11: bde bar gshegs pas ni sngar bshad pa'i nyon mongs pas rgyun bcad pa'i phyir yin gyi mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:206b-12: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa la sogs pa 'di shes par bya'o zhes smos pa byas nas snyoms par zhugs te shes pa bskyed pa de ni nyan thos kyi smon nas shes pa'o //
T03TD3803E:206b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:206b-14: sangs rgyas smon nas mkhyen pa ni //
T03TD3803E:206b-15: lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang //
T03TD3803E:206b-16: thogs pa med dang rtag gnas dang //
T03TD3803E:206b-19: lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:206b-20: thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
T03TD3803E:206b-21: rtag gnas ni rtag tu sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:206b-22: 'dri ba kun lan 'debs pa zhes bya ba ni dris pa thams cad sel ba'o //
T03TD3803E:206b-23: de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rang gi zhing yongs su dag par skyes te /
T03TD3803E:206b-24: ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du bzhugs so //
T03TD3803E:206b-25: de ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya zhe na /
T03TD3803E:206b-26: gtsor ni de nyid der skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:206b-27: 'jig pa dang rab tu 'jig pas na 'jig rten te /
T03TD3803E:206b-28: skye dgu dang de'i snod do //
T03TD3803E:206b-29: de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams ni gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:206b-32: de la sems can gyi 'jig rten yongs su dag pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03TD3803E:206b-33: sems can gyi khams thams cad bsod nams dang /
T03TD3803E:206b-34: ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:207a-0: bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs @207a * //
T03TD3803E:207a-1: su smin par byas pa'i sems can ji srid nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du der skye bar 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:207a-2: skyes nas kyang gang gi phyir byang chub kyi don du yongs su smin par byed pa 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:207a-3: de mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:207a-5: sems can gyi khams thams cad ces bya gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:207a-6: gang su dag der skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams thob ba dag go //
T03TD3803E:207a-7: de thams cad ni sems can gyi khams te sems can gyi tshogs so //
T03TD3803E:207a-8: de'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag ni mu med pas so //
T03TD3803E:207a-9: sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:207a-10: de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-14: rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
T03TD3803E:207a-15: de bzhin du snod kyi 'jig rten ni sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa /
T03TD3803E:207a-18: dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa yo byad dang gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ma dag tu yang 'od zer chen po rab tu 'phro bar byed la /
T03TD3803E:207a-19: steng gi nam mkha' la yang rjes su mthun par snang ba yin no //
T03TD3803E:207a-20: sems can yang khams drug pa ste /
T03TD3803E:207a-21: dge slong dag skyes bu 'di dag ni khams drug pa can no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T03TD3803E:207a-22: de'i phyir de dag gi lus kyang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-24: rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-25: dbyibs dang de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-26: kun spyod pa yang lta thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te gang dag gi longs spyod gcig tu bzang ba dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-28: gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-30: 'di lta bu'i khams drug yongs su dag pa mu med pa ni mtshams chad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:207a-31: mngon par spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:207b-0: de bas na @207b de mu med pas de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:207b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:207b-2: der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par song nas /
T03TD3803E:207b-3: de na gnas pa'i sems can gyi mi dge ba bsags pa dang /
T03TD3803E:207b-4: de'i gnyen po dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes te /
T03TD3803E:207b-5: de dag tshad med pas de dag yongs su gcod par byed pa'i shes rab kyang tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:207b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la dge ba'i chos ji snyed pa'i phyir chos ston par byed de /
T03TD3803E:207b-7: de ni chos thams cad bsags pa ste /
T03TD3803E:207b-8: de tshad med pas de dag 'jog par byed pa'i shes rab de dag kyang tshad med par rig par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:207b-9: 'di ni chos thams cad bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:207b-10: chos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mu med pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa la /
T03TD3803E:207b-12: ting nge 'dzin ni sems gnas pa'o //
T03TD3803E:207b-13: chos dang ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
T03TD3803E:207b-15: de thob pa ni de rnyed pa'o //
T03TD3803E:207b-16: gang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob bas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:207b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa la /
T03TD3803E:207b-18: de la sangs rgyas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T03TD3803E:207b-19: de'i chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de /
T03TD3803E:207b-20: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T03TD3803E:207b-21: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o //
T03TD3803E:207b-22: de dag mu med pa ni yongs su bcad du med pa'o //
T03TD3803E:207b-23: gang gis yongs su bcad du med ce na mnyam pa ste /
T03TD3803E:208a-1: las gzhan pa de lta bu med pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:208a-2: des na bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu nyid kyang mu med par rig par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:208a-3: gang gis de dag gi rgyu thams cad yang dag par shes pa dang /
T03TD3803E:208a-6: mtshan ni sum cu tsa gnyis dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-7: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di //
T03TD3803E:208a-8: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03TD3803E:208a-9: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed //
T03TD3803E:208a-11: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03TD3803E:208a-12: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni //
T03TD3803E:208a-13: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gsungs so//
T03TD3803E:208a-14: de la dang po'i lnga ni dbang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do //
T03TD3803E:208a-15: phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
T03TD3803E:208a-16: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel ba dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-17: phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha can //
T03TD3803E:208a-18: 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-19: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03TD3803E:208a-20: zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs //
T03TD3803E:208a-21: byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03TD3803E:208a-22: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog //
T03TD3803E:208a-23: pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-24: spu ni re re nas g-yas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-25: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra //
T03TD3803E:208a-26: 'di yi dpung ba'i mgo zlum thal gong rgyas //
T03TD3803E:208a-27: 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang //
T03TD3803E:208a-28: sku ni nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03TD3803E:208a-29: gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-30: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems //
T03TD3803E:208a-31: shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-32: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham par tshang ba dang //
T03TD3803E:208a-33: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi //
T03TD3803E:208a-34: 'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03TD3803E:208a-37: 'di la 'khor los mtshan pa'i phyag dang /
T03TD3803E:208a-38: zhabs yo pas na phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan no //
T03TD3803E:208a-39: 'di zhabs ru sbal ltar shin tu gnas pa yod pa'i phyir rus sbal zhabs so //
T03TD3803E:208a-40: de dag ni las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba'o //
T03TD3803E:208a-41: 'di la phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel ba yod pas na /
T03TD3803E:208a-42: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-0: @208b phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha can //
T03TD3803E:208b-1: 'di zhes bya ba 'og ma dang sbyar ro //
T03TD3803E:208b-2: 'de yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03TD3803E:208b-3: zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa'i gsum pa'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-5: bdun mtho bas mtshon pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:208b-6: 'di dag gis ni mtshan lnga bstan te phyag dang zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa dang zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-7: phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-8: phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-10: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03TD3803E:208b-11: zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs //
T03TD3803E:208b-12: byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03TD3803E:208b-13: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog //
T03TD3803E:208b-14: ces bya ba la sor mo ring ba dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-15: rting pa yangs pa zhes bya ba ni gcig tu bsdu ba'i zlas dbye'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-16: sku drang zhes bya ba ni sku che ba dang drang ba'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-17: zhabs long bu mi mngon pa yang yin la /
T03TD3803E:208b-18: spu gyen du phyogs pa yin pas /
T03TD3803E:208b-19: zhabs long mi mngon gyen du phyogs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:208b-20: long bu dang pus mo'i lha nga mdzes par mi mngon pa ni mi mngon pa'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-21: de'i phyir aung gi sgra ni khyad par dang mi mngon pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:208b-22: dung gi sgra ni pus mo'i lha nga dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-23: long bu'i rus pa'i don te /
T03TD3803E:208b-24: brla'i rtsa ba man chad kun la zhabs zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-25: 'di la mdoms kyi sba ba mchog tu nub pa yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-29: sku che zhing drang ba dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-30: zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-31: sbu gyen du phyogs pa dang //
T03TD3803E:208b-32: byin pa ri dags ae na ya'i lta bu dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-33: phyag dang brla zhing grims pa dang /
T03TD3803E:208b-34: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-35: pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03TD3803E:208b-36: spu ni re re nas gyas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03TD3803E:208b-37: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra //
T03TD3803E:208b-38: 'di la dpung pa mgo zlum thal gong rgyas //
T03TD3803E:208b-39: 'di la ro stod seng ge 'dra ba ni ro stod seng ge dang 'dra ba'o //
T03TD3803E:208b-40: mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba ni mi zlum pa ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:208b-41: mgur ma byang zhing kun nas zlum pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:208b-42: thal gong dag gi bar ni dbus te brang ngo //
T03TD3803E:209a-0: @209a * // de rgyas pa 'di la yod pas thal gong rgyas pa'o //
T03TD3803E:209a-1: 'dir ni mtshan sum cu bstan te /
T03TD3803E:209a-2: pags pa mdog gser lta bu dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-4: spu re re nas g-yas su legs par 'khrungs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-5: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-6: ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-9: 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang //
T03TD3803E:209a-10: sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03TD3803E:209a-11: gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags ring mdzes pa dang //
T03TD3803E:209a-12: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems //
T03TD3803E:209a-13: shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzangs dang //
T03TD3803E:209a-14: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang ba dang //
T03TD3803E:209a-15: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi //
T03TD3803E:209a-16: 'dra ba 'di mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03TD3803E:209a-18: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'dis ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan te /
T03TD3803E:209a-19: ro bro ba'i mchog nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-20: n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-21: gtsug tor gyen du 'phags pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-22: ljags ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-24: 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-25: thems shin tu dkar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-27: tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-28: tshems bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-30: spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-31: ba mchog ni be'u gzhon nu'o //
T03TD3803E:209a-32: yang na ba mchog ni khyu mchog go //
T03TD3803E:209a-33: 'di thams cad gcig tu byas pas ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to //
T03TD3803E:209a-37: chos kyi sbyin pa ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin te /
T03TD3803E:209a-38: 'di la mtshan nyid gang gang gi //
T03TD3803E:209a-39: sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin //
T03TD3803E:209a-40: de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T03TD3803E:209a-42: 'dir gang gi mtshan gang gi rgyu gang sgrub par byed pa de dang /
T03TD3803E:209a-43: de ni rab tu rdzogs pas thob pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T03TD3803E:209a-44: 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T03TD3803E:209a-45: yang gang gi rgyu gang yin zhe na /
T03TD3803E:209a-46: bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang //
T03TD3803E:209a-47: yang dag blangs la brtan pa dang //
T03TD3803E:209a-48: bsdu brten dang gya nom pa'i//
T03TD3803E:209b-0: @209b dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03TD3803E:209b-1: thar bar byed dang dge ba ni //
T03TD3803E:209b-2: yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03TD3803E:209b-3: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de //
T03TD3803E:209b-4: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T03TD3803E:209b-5: zhes bya ba la bla ma la bskyal ba dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-8: mchod rten la me tog gis mchod pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-9: bskor ba la sogs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-10: gyog 'khor phul bas ni phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
T03TD3803E:209b-11: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kun tu bsten pas ni phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba yin no //
T03TD3803E:209b-12: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa gya nom pa byin pas ni phyag dang zhabs gzhon sha can dang bdun mtho ba nyid do //
T03TD3803E:209b-13: gsad par bya ba thar byed dang //
T03TD3803E:209b-14: zhes bya ba'i tshig ni sogs pa'i don to //
T03TD3803E:209b-15: gsad pa thar bar byas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-16: srog rjes su gzung ba byas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-17: srog gcod pa las ldog pa kun du bsten pas /
T03TD3803E:209b-18: song mo ring ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-19: rting pa yangs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-20: sku che zhing drang ba nyid do //
T03TD3803E:209b-21: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-22: rnam par spel bas na zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-23: spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:209b-24: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de la sogs pa'o //
T03TD3803E:209b-25: mdo las 'di skad 'byung ba bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o //
T03TD3803E:209b-27: byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu chen po'i byed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir skyes bu chen po ste /
T03TD3803E:209b-28: de dag gsal bar byed pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan te sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T03TD3803E:209b-29: de dag mdzes par byed pa'i phyir dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste /
T03TD3803E:209b-30: de dag gi dbang du mdzad nas tshigs su bcad pa ni bcu gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:209b-31: thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang //
T03TD3803E:209b-32: mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
T03TD3803E:209b-33: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03TD3803E:209b-34: rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
T03TD3803E:209b-35: ces bya ba 'dis ni dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu bstan te /
T03TD3803E:209b-36: sen mo zangs kyi mdog nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-37: sen mo snum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-38: sen mo mtho ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-39: sor mo zlum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-40: sor mo rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-41: sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-42: rtsa mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:209b-43: mdud pa med pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:210a-2: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03TD3803E:210a-3: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-4: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03TD3803E:210a-6: zhes bya ba ni tshig rkang gcig lhag pa'i tshigs su bcad pas ni bcu gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:210a-7: long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-8: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-9: seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-10: glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-11: ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-12: khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-13: g-yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-14: mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-16: sku 'khril bag chags pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-17: sku byi dor byas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-18: sku rim par 'tshams par nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-19: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
T03TD3803E:210a-20: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-21: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03TD3803E:210a-22: zhes bya ba'i tshig rkang gsum gyis ni dpe byad bzang po lnga nyid de /
T03TD3803E:210a-25: sku rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-27: sku kho lag yangs shing mdzes pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:210a-28: gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-29: shin tu gzhon mdog can nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-30: sku zhum med de rgyas pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-31: shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-32: zhes bya ba 'di ni drug ste /
T03TD3803E:210a-33: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-34: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-35: sku gzhon sha can nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-36: sku zhum pa med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-38: sku shin tu grims pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:210a-39: yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-40: gzigs pa rab rib dag pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-41: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-42: phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni //
T03TD3803E:210a-43: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-44: kun nas blta na sdug pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210a-45: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni dgu ste /
T03TD3803E:210a-46: yan lag dang nying lag rnam par shin tu 'byes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-47: gzigs pa rab rib med cing dag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210a-49: dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-0: dku @210b ma rnyongs pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-1: phyal phyang nge ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-2: lte ba zab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-3: lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-4: kun nas mdzes pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:210b-5: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03TD3803E:210b-6: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-7: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-8: phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-9: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-10: zhal gzugs gzugs brnyan 'byung ba dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-12: zhal 'di la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba yod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T03TD3803E:210b-14: zhal gdong la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'o //
T03TD3803E:210b-15: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis pa 'dis ni brgyad de /
T03TD3803E:210b-16: kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyad dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-17: sku la sme ba gnag bag med pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-18: phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-19: phyag gi ser mo mdangs yod pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-20: phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-21: phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-22: zhal gdong la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba nyid do //
T03TD3803E:210b-23: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-24: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-25: gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum //
T03TD3803E:210b-26: rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-27: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-28: mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni //
T03TD3803E:210b-30: mchog ni dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:210b-31: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni bcu gnyis te /
T03TD3803E:210b-36: 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-37: gsung snyan cing mnyen la 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-38: mche ba zlum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-39: mche ba rno ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-40: mche ba dkar ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-41: mche ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-42: mche ba byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:210b-45: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug //
T03TD3803E:210b-47: smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-48: snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-49: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam dang //
T03TD3803E:210b-50: nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-2: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03TD3803E:211a-3: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad gnyis po 'dis ni bcu gsum mo //
T03TD3803E:211a-5: rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-6: spyan dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma lta bu nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-7: smin tshugs ring ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-8: smin ma snum pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-9: smin ma'i spu mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-10: phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-12: 'phral ba legs par 'byes pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-13: 'phral ba dbyes che ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-14: dbu shin tu rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-15: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03TD3803E:211a-17: dbu skra mi gshor nyid dang ni //
T03TD3803E:211a-18: dbu skra skyes bu yid 'phrog dang //
T03TD3803E:211a-19: dpal gyi be'u dang bkri shis ni //
T03TD3803E:211a-20: g-yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa ste //
T03TD3803E:211a-21: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03TD3803E:211a-22: ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed dang gnyis po 'dis ni bdun te /
T03TD3803E:211a-23: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-24: dbu skra stug pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-26: dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-27: dbu skra mi gshor ba nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-28: dbu skra dri zhim pa nyid dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-29: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa nyid do //
T03TD3803E:211a-30: thams cad gcig tu byas pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o //
T03TD3803E:211a-31: 'di ni long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T03TD3803E:211a-32: sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:211a-33: gang gi srid pa mi srid par //
T03TD3803E:211a-34: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag //
T03TD3803E:211a-35: mnyam pa mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
T03TD3803E:211a-36: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad //
T03TD3803E:211a-37: de bzhin de las 'khor ba'i bar //
T03TD3803E:211a-38: rgyun mi 'chad bar bzhed pa yin //
T03TD3803E:211a-41: chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la ji srid sa la spyod pa dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-42: bar snang la spyod pa'i 'gro ba dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-43: gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang /
T03TD3803E:211a-44: rag gi bsdus pa ni chos te /
T03TD3803E:211a-45: sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:211b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams @211b mtha' yas pa dag tu sprul pa de dag ni chos thams cad de /
T03TD3803E:211b-1: de dag mu med par rig par bya'o //
T03TD3803E:211b-3: gang gi sprul pa de dag go //
T03TD3803E:211b-4: stong pa nyid mu med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:211b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la ji ltar sprul pa'i sku de dag mu med pa de bzhin du de dag gi stong pa nyid kyang mu med do //
T03TD3803E:211b-7: sems dang sems las byung nga la rag las pa ste /
T03TD3803E:211b-8: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:211b-9: de'i phyir de yang mu med pas mu med pa ste /
T03TD3803E:211b-11: ji ltar yang de dag lus dang ngag gi sprul pa de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba yang ci'i phyir mi sprul zhe na /
T03TD3803E:211b-12: de la nye bar len pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir dang /
T03TD3803E:211b-13: sngon med pa'i sems can mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:211b-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa ni /
T03TD3803E:211b-15: sems dang sems las byung ba la yang 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T03TD3803E:211b-16: sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa ni //
T03TD3803E:211b-17: sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can yin //
T03TD3803E:211b-18: zhes bya ba'i tshig las so //
T03TD3803E:211b-19: 'on kyang nye bar len pa yod na yod par 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:211b-20: lhas byin gyis brlabs nas rmi lam du bstan pa lta bu 'am /
T03TD3803E:211b-21: tshig las tshig gi don go ba bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:211b-22: de'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:211b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:211b-24: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa dag tu sems can gyi khams mu med pa'i spyod pa mu med pa la rnam par gzigs nas /
T03TD3803E:211b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa yin te /
T03TD3803E:211b-26: de'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:211b-27: sems can de dag gis kyang ji ltar bstan pa'i chos la dmigs nas gnyen po'i dge ba'i chos skye bar 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:211b-28: des kyang de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong bar 'gyur te /
T03TD3803E:211b-29: de'i phyir dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos gzhal du med pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:211b-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du med par rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T03TD3803E:212a-1: sprul pa de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yin /
T03TD3803E:212a-2: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T03TD3803E:212a-3: de ltar na ni sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po la sogs pa yang sgyu ma mkhan gyi lus su 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03TD3803E:212a-4: rang gi skur byin gyis brlabs pa der sprul pa'i phyir nyid kyi sku bzhin du gshegs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212a-6: bya ba la sogs pa mdzad pa de yang de'i sku yin no //
T03TD3803E:212a-7: de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i sku bstan te /
T03TD3803E:212a-8: de dag ni sku gsum mo //
T03TD3803E:212a-9: da ni mdzad pa mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:212a-10: de yang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:212a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su rig par bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T03TD3803E:212a-12: ri dags rnams kyi mchog ni seng ge'o //
T03TD3803E:212a-13: de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir skyes bu dam pa ni skyes bu seng ge zhes brjod do //
T03TD3803E:212a-14: 'di ni khyad par du gyur pa ste /
T03TD3803E:212a-15: lha dang mi rnams la sogs pa skyes bu thams cad kyi dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:212a-16: de la seng ge zhes brjod do //
T03TD3803E:212a-17: de'i chos ni bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212a-18: gzhan pha rol rgol ba'i ri dags thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas seng ge'i sgra zhes brjod do //
T03TD3803E:212a-19: seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bzhin no //
T03TD3803E:212a-20: de sgrog pa ni ston pa'o //
T03TD3803E:212a-21: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
T03TD3803E:212a-22: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab ni /
T03TD3803E:212a-23: bgrod par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03TD3803E:212a-24: de yang seng ge'i sgra ste /
T03TD3803E:212a-25: mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun ston pa ste /
T03TD3803E:212a-26: de ni rgyas par yum chen mo dag las blta bar bya'o //
T03TD3803E:212a-27: de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03TD3803E:212a-28: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T03TD3803E:212a-29: bsdu rnams bzhi la dgod pa dang //
T03TD3803E:212a-30: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi //
T03TD3803E:212a-31: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03TD3803E:212a-32: sems can rnams don ji bzhin gyi //
T03TD3803E:212a-33: don dang pha rol phyin drug dang //
T03TD3803E:212a-34: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis //
T03TD3803E:212a-35: stong pa nyid gnyis mi zad dang //
T03TD3803E:212a-36: brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-0: lus can rnams ni yongs @212b smin dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni //
T03TD3803E:212b-2: mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-3: byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing //
T03TD3803E:212b-4: rnam par dag dang nges pa dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-5: sems can don ni tshad med dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-6: sangs rgyas rten sogs yon tan dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-7: byang chub yan lag las rnams ni //
T03TD3803E:212b-8: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-9: phyin ci log ni spang pa dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-10: de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni //
T03TD3803E:212b-11: rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni //
T03TD3803E:212b-13: tha dad yongs su mi shes dang //
T03TD3803E:212b-14: mya ngan 'das la dgod pa ste //
T03TD3803E:212b-15: chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di //
T03TD3803E:212b-16: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed //
T03TD3803E:212b-17: ces bya ba gsungs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku gang gis dmyal ba rnams kyi dmyal ba'i me zhi bar 'gyur ba 'di ltar chos ston pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212b-18: de bzhin du dud 'gro dag la yang rang gi khrag la sogs pa'i sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212b-19: de bzhin du yi dags rnams la yang bza' ba dang /
T03TD3803E:212b-20: btung ba la sogs pa byin nas chos bstan te /
T03TD3803E:212b-22: mngon par dad pa des rang gi 'gro ba las shi 'phos te /
T03TD3803E:212b-23: lha dang mi rnams su skye bar mdzad de /
T03TD3803E:212b-24: lha rnams la yang theg pa dman pa la mos shing dang bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te /
T03TD3803E:212b-25: mi rnams su skye bar byas nas nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar la gnas par byed pa 'di ni 'gro ba rnams zhi ba'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:212b-26: yang gang dag mi rnams kyi phyi nang gi zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212b-28: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212b-31: don mthun pa la slob par byed pa 'di ni bsdu pa'i dngos po la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:212b-32: kun nas nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T03TD3803E:212b-34: de gnyis nub pa ni rnam par byang ba'o //
T03TD3803E:212b-36: chos la bdag med par shes pa'i phyir 'di ni kun rdzob bo //
T03TD3803E:212b-37: don dam par chos kyi dbyings las gzhan med de /
T03TD3803E:212b-38: 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03TD3803E:213a-0: rnam par byang ba shes pa la @213a * //
T03TD3803E:213a-2: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis bza' ba dang /
T03TD3803E:213a-3: bca' ba la sogs pa'i bar gyi dngos po sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed de /
T03TD3803E:213a-4: de yang 'jig rten gyi dngos po 'di thams cad med par shes pa ni ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:213a-5: gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs par cung zad kyang mthong ba med de /
T03TD3803E:213a-7: sems can du btags pa yang ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:213a-8: chos rnams kyang bdag med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03TD3803E:213a-9: 'di ni sems can rnams kyi don ji lta ba bzhin gyi bdag nyid la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213a-10: de bdag nyid kyang sbyin par byed /
T03TD3803E:213a-11: gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor bar byed /
T03TD3803E:213a-12: sbyin pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed /
T03TD3803E:213a-13: gang gzhan dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing mthun par byed do //
T03TD3803E:213a-14: de bzhin du bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:213a-15: 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213a-16: bdag nyid kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par byed pa dang /
T03TD3803E:213a-17: bdag nyid kyang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga nas /
T03TD3803E:213a-18: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T03TD3803E:213a-19: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyis te /
T03TD3803E:213a-20: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213a-21: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa la rdzogs pa'i chos ston pa na /
T03TD3803E:213a-22: de dag gi 'khor gsum dag pa'i 'bras bu yang rang bzhin gyis stong par ston par byed de /
T03TD3803E:213a-23: de dag de bzhin du bsgoms pas lhag par khyad par du 'gro ste /
T03TD3803E:213a-24: des na de dag stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la lan mang du sgom par byed pas /
T03TD3803E:213a-25: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du khyad par 'gro bar byed de /
T03TD3803E:213a-26: 'di ni stong pa nyid la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213a-27: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad de /
T03TD3803E:213a-28: rang bzhin gyis stong pa yang gzhan ma yin no //
T03TD3803E:213a-29: chos thams cad kyang gzhan ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:213a-30: 'on kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid chos so //
T03TD3803E:213a-31: de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:213b-0: @213b 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i chos ni gang yang med de /
T03TD3803E:213b-2: gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03TD3803E:213b-3: phung po dang khams la sogs pa nas /
T03TD3803E:213b-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chos ston pa de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin te /
T03TD3803E:213b-5: 'di ni brdar btags pa shes pas dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213b-6: gal te pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa de lta na yang /
T03TD3803E:213b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi nus la gal te yang de dag la yang spyod cing /
T03TD3803E:213b-8: 'khor gsum gyi 'bras bu de dag la yang mi dmigs pa de'i tshe ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nus te //
T03TD3803E:213b-9: 'di ni dmigs pa med pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213b-10: gal te byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
T03TD3803E:213b-11: sems can dang sems can du brtags pa yang mi dmigs te /
T03TD3803E:213b-12: 'on kyang de kun rdzob mthong nas sems can rnams dngos por dmigs pas /
T03TD3803E:213b-13: kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa na /
T03TD3803E:213b-14: des de dag gi de rnams spang pa'i phyir /
T03TD3803E:213b-15: theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed de /
T03TD3803E:213b-16: 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213b-17: de pha rol tu phyin pa re re la sogs pa la spyod pa ni /
T03TD3803E:213b-18: sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /
T03TD3803E:213b-19: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob par byed de /
T03TD3803E:213b-20: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213b-21: de de ltar nye bar rtog pa na /
T03TD3803E:213b-22: chos thams cad stong pa nyid de /
T03TD3803E:213b-23: stong pa nyid la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
T03TD3803E:213b-24: de bas na chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bsgom par bya zhing /
T03TD3803E:213b-25: sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyad par bya ste /
T03TD3803E:213b-26: 'khor gsum po de dag la yang rlom sems su mi bya'o //
T03TD3803E:213b-27: 'di ni mngon par zhen pa thams cad spangs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:213b-28: lam gyis byang chub thob pa la yang ma yin /
T03TD3803E:213b-29: lam ma yin pas kyang ma yin te /
T03TD3803E:213b-30: gang gi phyir byang chub nyid lam mo //
T03TD3803E:214a-2: gal te de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyid sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03TD3803E:214a-3: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
T03TD3803E:214a-4: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
T03TD3803E:214a-5: skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis /
T03TD3803E:214a-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa de'i tshe /
T03TD3803E:214a-7: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T03TD3803E:214a-8: thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'o zhes ston te /
T03TD3803E:214a-9: 'di ni byang chub thob pa la dgod pa'i phrin las so //
T03TD3803E:214a-10: de bdag dang gzhan dag gi tshul khrims 'chal pa la mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis yang dag par bsdus pa dang /
T03TD3803E:214a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /
T03TD3803E:214a-12: theg pa dman pa'i 'bras bu lnga mngon sum du byed cing reg pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed cing phung po dang /
T03TD3803E:214a-13: khams la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T03TD3803E:214a-14: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi gnas ngan len bsal nas /
T03TD3803E:214a-15: rang yang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams la gnas par byed la /
T03TD3803E:214a-16: gzhan yang de dag la 'god par byed cing /
T03TD3803E:214a-17: bdag gi dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
T03TD3803E:214a-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
T03TD3803E:214a-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T03TD3803E:214a-20: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par yongs su sngo bar byed cing /
